Title: Ubushakashatsi bwagaragaje uburyo bushya bwo kwica agakoko gatera igituntu
Body:
Abashakashatsi bagaragaje ko agakoko gatera igituntu kugira ngo kabeho, gakenera intungamubiri zizwi nk’ubutare (fer). Mu gihe hahagaritswe inzira ijyana ubutare aho agakoko kari, igituntu ntigishibora gukura ngo gishegeshe abantu.
Abashakashatsi bagaragaje ko agakoko gatera igituntu kugira ngo kabeho, gakenera intungamubiri zizwi nk’ubutare (fer). Mu gihe hahagaritswe inzira ijyana ubutare aho agakoko kari, igituntu ntigishibora gukura ngo gishegeshe abantu.
Ibi byagaragaje uburyo bushya bushobora kwifashishwa n’abahanga mu gukora imiti y’igituntu no kugihashya kitarangiza abantu.
Abashakashatsi bagaragaje ko iyo agakoko gatera igituntu kabuze ubutare (fer) kadashobora gukura.
Igituntu giterwa n’agakoko kazwi nka Mycobacterium tuberculosis, kandi kaboneka kenshi mu mubiri w’umuntu.
Abashakashatsi bizeye ko ubushakashatsi bushya buzafasha mu gushaka umuti nyawo uhangana n’indwara y’igituntu.
Markus Seeger, umwarimu mu ishami ry’ubuvuzi muri Kaminuza ya Zurich (UZH), akaba no mu itsinda ryakoze ubushakashatsi yavuze ko basanze ako gakoko gatera igituntu iyo kageze mu mubiri gacura utundi turemangingo intungamubiri z’ubutare.
Seeger yavuze ko babashije guhagarika utunyangingo duto twitwa IrtAB dutwara ubutare tubujyana mu gakoko gatera igituntu, kadashobora gukura cyangwa kakaba kanapfa, bityo igituntu ntikizahaze abantu.
Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye ryita ku Buzima (OMS), ryatangaje ko umwaka ushize abantu miliyoni 1.5 bishwe n’indwara zibasira ibihaha n’igituntu kirimo.

Title: Tuuza bundle, ipaki ya internet yakwifashishwa muri iki gihe cya Coronavirus
Body:
Sositeye y’Itumanaho ya MTN Rwanda izwiho cyane guteza imbere ikoranabuhanga, ikomeje gutanga ibyiza byinshi byafasha abanyarwanda kumenya amakuru y’ababo, kuganira no gukora akazi buri wese ari iwe mu rugo mu rwego rwo kwirinda coronavirus.
Sositeye y’Itumanaho ya MTN Rwanda izwiho cyane guteza imbere ikoranabuhanga, ikomeje gutanga ibyiza byinshi byafasha abanyarwanda kumenya amakuru y’ababo, kuganira no gukora akazi buri wese ari iwe mu rugo mu rwego rwo kwirinda coronavirus.
MTN Rwanda ifite serivisi zo guhamagara hakoreshejwe amapaki atandukanye, hohererezanya ubutumwa bugufi, by’umwihariko muri ibi bihe byo kwirinda Coronavirus kohererezanya amafaranga nta kiguzi cy’ayo gukata umukiliya arengejeho mu gihe yishyura akoresheje Mobile Money.
Hari amapaki ya Internet atandukanye buri muntu agura bitewe n’iyo akeneye n’ibyo akeneye kuyikoresha, muri zo habamo iyitwa Tuuza bundle iri gufasha benshi muri iki gihe.
Tuuza bundle ni ipaki ya internet itanga Megabytes (Mbs) nyinshi. Nta gihe runaka imara, uhabwa Mbs ukazikoresha uko wifuza. Pack irangira ari uko izo Mbs zishize.
Hari igura Frw 200 itanga Mbs 130 igurwa umuntu akanze *345# akajya kuri 2 agakurikiza amabwiriza. Hari igura Frw 1000 itanga Mbs 800 nayo umuntu agura akanda *345# akajya kuri 2 agakurikiza amabwiriza.
Ushobora kandi gukanda *154# cyangwa *182# maze ugakurikiza amabwiriza.
Uretse iyo, hari andi mapaki menshi ya internet; arimo; ‘Irekure, (Internet Irekure) itanga Packs za 3G, 4G Irekure, Pack za 5G n’izindi nyinshi.

Title: Impamvu ‘Zoom’ yanikiye izindi porogaramu zifasha mu guhamagara cyangwa gukora inama mu ikoranabuhanga
Body:
Mu buryo busanzwe, iyo abantu bavuze urubuga nkoranyambaga rukunzwe cyane hakundaga kuza urufasha mu gusakaza amashusho, amafoto, kwibutsa isabukuru y’amavuko n’izindi.
Mu buryo busanzwe, iyo abantu bavuze urubuga nkoranyambaga rukunzwe cyane hakundaga kuza urufasha mu gusakaza amashusho, amafoto, kwibutsa isabukuru y’amavuko n’izindi.
Muri iyi minsi ibintu byahindutse kubera ko hafi ya buri wese yategetswe gukorera mu rugo kubera Coronavirus, nyamara agakomeza gukenera kuvugana n’abakozi bagenzi be, kwitabira inama z’ikigo akoramo cyangwa ayobora. Ibyo ntibirimo gukorwa na applications za Twitter, Facebook, Snapchat cyangwa TikTok. Ahubwo ni iyitwa Zoom.
Ni uburyo bwahanzwe n’umushinwa Eric Yuan mu myaka icyenda ishize, ariko ubu bwamaze guca kuri Skype na Microsoft Teams mu kwifashishwa cyane. Ni nabwo buryo inama iheruka guhuza ibihugu 20 bikize ku Isi, G20, yifashishije.
Burimo kwifashishwa kurusha ubundi bwari busanzwe nka FaceTime zikoreshwa kuri za iPhone. Ibyo bikagaragaza impamvu iki kigo cyagiye ku isoko ry’imari n’imigabane muri Mata mu mwaka, kibarirwa agaciro ka miliyari $15, ubu kigeze muri miliyari $40.
-	Zoom yoroshya ubuzima
Mu gihe kirekire, gukora inama hifashishijwe amashusho byasabaga kubanza gushyira porogaramu runaka muri mudasobwa cyangwa telefoni, ukamenya uburyo uyihuza n’igikoresho ufite, rimwe na rimwe bigasaba guca mu nzira nyinshi.
Igihe udafite application ya Zoom mu gikoresho cyawe, bizakorohera kuyishyiramo. Igihe inama irimo kubera kuri Zoom, ishobora guhurirwamo abantu bagera ku 100 buri wese ari imbere ya mudasobwa cyangwa telefoni ye, kandi umuntu akaba areba buri wese uri mu nama imbere ye.
Ubusanzwe nka Skype ku buntu yemera abantu 50, ariko Zoom igashyiraho akarusho k’uko nk’urugero niba utetse ugakenera kuvugana n’abandi, ntabwo ari ngombwa ko bakurebera igikoni, ushobora kugena uko inyuma hawe hagaragara mu maso y’abo muri kumwe mu nama.
Ni ukuvuga ko muri icyo gihe, ushobora kubigira nk’aho urimo kuganira wicaye ku mucanga cyangwa mu isanzure. Ubasha kandi kohereza ubutumwa ku muntu uhisemo cyangwa gufata amashusho y’ikiganiro kirimo kuba, ukaza kuyabika.
Umuntu aba afite igihe cy’iminota 40 cyo gukora inama, ku buryo iyo ukeneye ko irenga, umuntu ku giti cye yishyura $14.99 ku kwezi naho ikigo kikishyura $19.99.
-	Buri wese yayikoresha
Ntabwo Zoom itoranya ubushobozi bw’igikoresho cy’ikoranabuhanga. Ikora kuri mudasobwa ngendanwa, iPad, iPhone, mudasobwa yo mu biro cyangwa telefoni ikoresha Android. Ni ukuvuga ko umuntu wese, aho ari hose, ashobora kuyikoresha.
Abantu baranayishidukiye kubera ko mu byumweru bishize, Zoom yabaye application yamanuwe kuri internet (download) inshuro nyinshi kuri Apple App Store, kuko nko ku wa Mbere tariki 23 Werurwe yari imaze kumanurwa inshuro miliyoni 2.13, zivuye ku nshuro miliyoni 2.04 ku munsi wari wabanje.
Nyamara mbere y’amezi abiri yabanje, iyi porogaramu yamanurwaga inshuro zitarenze 56.000 ku munsi.
Kuva ibihugu byatangira gusaba abantu bose kuguma mu ngo, bibarwa ko abantu bamaze kuyimanura muri Google inshuro zisaga miliyoni 50.
-	Ikora mu buryo bwizewe
Urebye uburyo Zoom irimo gukoreshwa ku rwego rwo hejuru, ushobora kumva uburyo abayikoresha bayizera. Nibyo koko hagiye habamo ibibazo bike. Ariko magingo aya ikoreshwa n’inzego zinyuranye zaba iz’umutekano, ubuvuzi n’izindi.
Impungenge ariko ntizibura. Hari nk’igikorwa kirimo kwitwa "Zoombombing", aho abajura mu by’ikoranabuhanga bashobora kwinjira mu kiganiro banyuze kuri konti y’umuntu umwe, ugasanga berekanyeho amashusho atajyanye n’ibirimo kuba.
Rumwe mu ngero ziheruka gutangazwa ni uburyo banyuze ku muntu umwe bakereka abari mu nama bose amashusho y’urukozasoni.

Title: Huawei yashyize hanze telefone nshya za P40
Body:
Uruganda rukora telefone rwo mu Bushinwa, Huawei rwashyize hanze telefone nshya ziswe P40 nubwo isi ikomeje guhangana n’icyorezo cya coronavirus.
Uruganda rukora telefone rwo mu Bushinwa, Huawei rwashyize hanze telefone nshya ziswe P40 nubwo isi ikomeje guhangana n’icyorezo cya coronavirus.
Izi telefone zishyizwe hanze nyuma y’umunsi umwe urwo ruganda rutangaje ko 90 % by’abakozi barwo 150 000 hirya no hino mu Bushinwa, bagarutse ku mirimo nyuma y’igihe bari mu ngo kubera coronavirus.
Inzobere zigaragaza ko nubwo Huawei yashyize hanze izo telefone, zishobora kutagurwa cyane kuko zije mu gihe ubukungu bitifashe neza kubera coronavirus.
Ubwoko bushya bwa telefone za Huawei ntabwo burimo porogaramu za Google nka Youtube, Amakarita na Play Store kubera ko Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zabujije sosiyete zo muri icyo gihugu gukorana n’izo mu Bushinwa mu bucuruzi.
Huawei iracyari sosiyete ya kabiri igurisha telefone nyinshi ku isi nyuma ya Samsung. Huawei yari yiyemeje kuvana Samsung kuri uwo mwanya bitarenze 2019 ariko ntibyayikundiye.
Telefone za P40 zasohowe zirimo ubwoko butatu burimo P40 iringaniye, P40 pro na P40 pro+. Izo ebyiri za nyuma zifite uburebure bwa santimetero zigera kuri 16, bikaba bizigira nini kurusha iPhone 11 Pro Max ya Apple.
Ubwo bwoko bwose bwa telefone bukoresha internet ya 5G. P40 iringaniye ifite camera eshatu, na zoom ya 3x ituma umuntu ashobora gukurura ikintu kiri kure ifoto ntite ireme.
P40 Pro yo ifite zoom ya 5x ituma ifata amashusho akeye mu gihe Pro+ ifite zoom ya 10x.
Mu zindi porogaramu ziri muri izo telefone harimo TikTok, Telegram, Viber na Microsoft Office. Uretse porogaramu za Google, telefone za P40 ntizirimo Twitter, Facebook na WhatsApp.
Huawei yashyizemo indi porogaramu isimbura YouTube yiswe Huawei video. Iyi sosiyete kandi yasinye amasezerano na BBC yo kujya ihabwa video zayo.
Telefone za P40 na P40 Pro zizashyirwa ku isoko tariki 7 Mata, iya mbere ikazaba igura amadolari 890 naho iya kabiri igura amadolari 1100. Telefone za P40 Pro+ zo zizajya ku isoko muri Kamena zigura amadolari 1540.

Title: U Rwanda ku rutonde rw’ibihugu Apple yaguriyemo isoko ryayo
Body:
Uruganda rukora ibikoresho by’Ikoranabuhanga rwa Apple rwongereye umubare w’ibihugu byemerewe gukora no gukoresha applications zishyirwa muri mudasobwa, iPad na telefoni zarwo mu buryo bwemewe.
Uruganda rukora ibikoresho by’Ikoranabuhanga rwa Apple rwongereye umubare w’ibihugu byemerewe gukora no gukoresha applications zishyirwa muri mudasobwa, iPad na telefoni zarwo mu buryo bwemewe.
Ni igikorwa cyakiriwe neza n’abasanzwe bakora za applications zishyirwa mu bikoresho by’ikoranabuhanga bo mu Rwanda kuko ngo bigiye kubafasha kwagura ibikorwa byabo bijyanye no kuzikora kandi bakabona indi soko y’amafaranga batari basanganywe.
N’ubwo nta tariki nyayo Apple yatangaje ko abakora za applications bazaba bemerewe gutangira gushyira ibikorwa byabo ku rubuga rwayo, uru ruganda rwabasabye kwinjira muri konti zabo ku rubuga rwa Apple, bakemeza uburyo bushya bujyanye n’amasezerano y’imikoranire avuguruye bitarenze tariki ya 10 Mata 2020. Ibi bizatuma ngo applications zabo zibonwa n’abantu bifashisha ibikoresho bya Apple hirya no hino ku Isi igihe nikigera.
Ubusanzwe u Rwanda ntirwari mu bihugu byemerewe gukoresha no guhabwa ubufasha bujyanye na applications za Apple kuko umuntu wakeneraga kugira application agura, agurisha cyangwa ikindi gikorwa kimusaba kuzuza umwirondoro we mu ikoranabuhanga rya Apple, byamusabaga gushaka ikindi gihugu yiyitirira kugira ngo abone ibyo akeneye.
Uwashinze akaba n’Umuyobozi Mukuru w’Ikigo Khenz gikora za applications za mudasobwa na telefoni, Habineza Moussa, yavuze ko ubusanzwe u Rwanda rwari rumeze nk’ururi mu kato.
Ati ’’Ku isoko rya applications rya Apple, ba rwiyemezamirimo b’Abanyarwanda n’abandi bo mu bihugu 20 byatangajwe bari mu kato ariko ubu biratandukanye.’’
Yakomeje avuga ko Abanyarwanda basanzwe bakoresha application za Apple batazongera kwiyitirira ibindi bihugu kugira ngo bazifashishe kandi ko bazabasha kwishyura bifashishije amakarita ya banki n’umwirondoro byo mu Rwanda nta nkomyi.
Uruganda rwa Apple rwari rusanzwe rwemerera abakora za applications zijyanye n’ibikoresho byarwo rukanatanga ubufasha ku bakiliya barwo mu bihugu 155 ku Isi.
Usibye u Rwanda, ibindi bihugu biri ku rutonde rw’ibyo Apple yaguriyemo ubucuruzi bwayo ni Afghanistan, Gabon, Côte d’Ivoire, Georgie, Maldives, Serbie, Bosnie na Herzegovina, Cameroun, Iraq, Kosovo, Libya, Montenegro, Maroc, Mozambique, Myanmar, Nauru, Tonga, Zambie na Vanuatu.

Title: Apple yafunze amaduka yayo yose ku isi uretse mu Bushinwa
Body:
Uruganda rukora telefone n’ibindi bikoresho by’ikoranabuhanga, Apple rwatangaje ko rubaye rufunze amaduka yarwo hirya no hino ku Isi uretse mu Bushinwa, hagamijwe kurinda abakozi barwo icyorezo cya Coronavirus gikomeje guhungabanya Isi.
Uruganda rukora telefone n’ibindi bikoresho by’ikoranabuhanga, Apple rwatangaje ko rubaye rufunze amaduka yarwo hirya no hino ku Isi uretse mu Bushinwa, hagamijwe kurinda abakozi barwo icyorezo cya Coronavirus gikomeje guhungabanya Isi.
Uru ruganda rufite amaduka menshi ku isi, rwiyemeje no gutanga miliyoni 15 z’amadolari mu gufasha guhangana na coronavirus.
Apple yihaye ibyumweru bibiri kugeza kuwa 27 Werurwe akaba ari bwo izatangaza niba abakozi bayo bakomeza kuguma mu rugo cyangwa basubira mu kazi.
Mu bice bidatuwe cyane aho abakozi bashobora kujya ku kazi, Apple yatangaje ko bazakomeza gukora ariko bakigengesera cyane kubera coronavirus.
Impamvu mu Bushinwa amaduka arakomeza gukora ni uko umubare w’abandura coronavirus ukomeje kugabanyuka.
Kuri uyu wa Gatanu amaduka 42 ya Apple yafunguwe mu Bushinwa nyuma y’ukwezi afunzwe.
Muri Gashyantare nibwo Apple yabaye ihagaritse ibikorwa byayo mu Bushinwa ubwo icyo gihugu cyari cyahagaritse ibikorwa mu mijyi myinshi kugira ngo kibashe guhangana na coronavirus.
Byagize ingaruka z’ubukungu kuri Apple kuko telefone urwo ruganda rwagurishije muri Gashyantare 2020 zagabanyutseho kimwe cya kabiri ugereranyije n’izo rwagurishije mu kwezi nk’uko umwaka ushize.
Ikindi cyashegeshe Apple ni uko zimwe mu nganda zo mu Bushinwa zikora ibikoresho byifashishwa muri telefone zayo zari zabaye zihagaritse imirimo.
Apple itangaza ko muri Gashyantare yagurishije telefone za iPhones 494,000 mu Bushinwa ugereranyije na iPhones miliyoni 1.27 zagurishijwe muri Gashyantare umwaka ushize.

Title: Cogebanque yatanze telefone igihumbi muri gahunda ya Connect Rwanda
Body:
Banki y’Ubucuruzi ya Cogebanque yashyikirije MTN Rwanda telefone zigezweho 1000 zizahabwa Abanyarwanda batishoboye muri gahunda ya Connect Rwanda, igamije kugeza smartphones ku badafite ubushobozi bwo kuzigurira.
Banki y’Ubucuruzi ya Cogebanque yashyikirije MTN Rwanda telefone zigezweho 1000 zizahabwa Abanyarwanda batishoboye muri gahunda ya Connect Rwanda, igamije kugeza smartphones ku badafite ubushobozi bwo kuzigurira.
Ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa Kane tariki 12 Werurwe, nibwo abayobozi ba Cogebanque bashyikirije MTN Rwanda telefone 1000 mu rwego rwo gutanga umusanzu wayo mu kwihutisha ikoranabuhanga mu banyarwanda.
Ku wa 20 Ukuboza 2019 nibwo MTN Rwanda yatangije ubukangurambaga bwa Connect Rwanda, ibigo n’abantu ku giti cyabo batangira kwiyemeza umubare wa telefoni zigezweho bazatanga zigahabwa abaturage badafite ubushobozi bwo kuzigura mu turere dutandukanye, nibura imwe muri buri rugo.
Kuva icyo gihe ibigo bitandukanye n’abantu ku giti cyabo bahise batangira kwiyemeza izo bazatanga, abandi bakazitanga cyangwa bagatanga amafaranga yo kuzigura.
Uretse gushyigikira iyi gahunda ya Connect Rwanda, Cogebanque ikomeje gahunda zitadukanye zigamike guteza imbere ikoranabuhanga.
Yagabye amashami 28, ifite aba-agents barenga 600, ikaba ifite serivisi zitandukanye zitangwa hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga ririmo amakarita, internet banking ndetse na telefone (Mobile banking, Mobile App na push & pull).
Ni serivisi yifashishwa n’abakiliya b’iyi banki mu kuba babona uko konti zabo zihagaze mu gihe havuyeho amafaranga cyangwa yongewe kuri konti, ishobora kandi kwifashihwa mu kwishyura fagitire z’amazi n’umuriro ndetse uyikoresha ashobora no kwiyoherereza amafaranga yo guhamagaza kuri telefone.
Cogebanque itanga Serivisi Mpuzamahanga binyuze mu ikoranabuhanga mu korohereza abanyarwanda kwizigamira nkuko biri muri gahunda za leta.

Title: Ibikoresho by’ikoranabuhanga rya Android biri mu byago byo kwibasirwa n’aba-hackers
Body:
Telefoni n’ibindi bikoresho by’ikoranabuhanga bikoresha uburyo bwa Android birenga miliyari imwe, biri mu byago byinshi byo kuba byakwibasirwa n’abajura mu by’ikoranabuhanga (hackers), kuko bitagifite ubushobozi bwo gukoresha uburyo bujyanisha ubwirinzi n’igihe (Security updates).
Telefoni n’ibindi bikoresho by’ikoranabuhanga bikoresha uburyo bwa Android birenga miliyari imwe, biri mu byago byinshi byo kuba byakwibasirwa n’abajura mu by’ikoranabuhanga (hackers), kuko bitagifite ubushobozi bwo gukoresha uburyo bujyanisha ubwirinzi n’igihe (Security updates).
Ubushakashatsi bushya bwagaragaje ko ibi bishobora gusiga abafite izi telefoni ku Isi yose bari mu byago byo kwibwa amakuru no kugabwaho ibindi bitero by’ikoranabuhanga.
Bwagaragaje ko abagera kuri 40% bakoresha telefoni za Android, bafite izidashobora kwakira uburyo bushyira ku gihe (update) ubwirinzi butangwa na Google.
Buri wese ukoresha telefoni ya Android, yasohotse mu 2012 cyangwa hafi yaho, ni we urebwa by’umwihariko. Imibare ya 2019 ya Google yerekana ko hari abarenga miliyari 2.5 bakoresha Android.
Telefoni za kera zasuzumwe zirimo Motorola, Samsung, Sony na LG, byagaragaye ko zifite ibyago byinshi byo kwinjirirwa. By’umwihariko Samsung Galaxy S3 na Sony Xperia S zifite ibi byago mu buryo bwihariye.
Buri wese ukoresha Android yasohotse mbere ya 7.0 ni ukuvuga mbere ya 2016, arasabwa kugerageza kuyijyanisha n’igihe.
Niba igikoresho cyawe gifite Android kimaze imyaka irenze ibiri, genzura niba cyashyirwa ku rundi rwego (version) y’imikorere yacyo. Niba uri kuri version irenze 7.0, gerageza kuyijyanisha n’igihe unyuze kuri Settings> System>Advanced System update.
Niba bidakunda, ubwo telefoni yawe iri mu byago byo kwibasirwa n’abajura mu ikoranabuhanga by’umwihariko niba ukoresha Android ya 4 cyangwa munsi yayo.
Abahanga mu by’ikoranabuhanga batanze umuburo ku bafite ibyo bikoresho ko bakwiye kwitondera kumanura (download) application zitari muri Google Play Store no kugira amakenga ku butumwa bugufi (SMS) n’ubunyujijwe mu ikoranabuhanga (MMS) bakira.

Title: Ibitanda mu ndege: Air New Zealand igiye gutangiza ingendo z’indege zizajya zifasha abashaka kuryama
Body:
Sosiyete ikora ingendo z’indege, Air New Zealand yatangaje ko igiye gutangiza ingendo zihariye, aho abashaka kuryama bazajya bagenerwa ibitanda byihariye mu ndege bakaruhuka cyane cyane ku ngendo zigana mu byerekezo bya kure.
Sosiyete ikora ingendo z’indege, Air New Zealand yatangaje ko igiye gutangiza ingendo zihariye, aho abashaka kuryama bazajya bagenerwa ibitanda byihariye mu ndege bakaruhuka cyane cyane ku ngendo zigana mu byerekezo bya kure.
Iyo sosiyete yavuze ko nubwo ari agashya, bizatwara igihe kirenga umwaka ngo ibyo bitanda bibe byamaze kugezwa mu ndege zayo.
Kuri uyu wa Gatatu, Air New Zealand yatangaje ko yamaze kwandika ishinganisha ibitanda byayo mbere yo gutangira kubikoresha mu ndege. Ubu buryo bwiswe Economy Skynest, buzaba bufite ibitanda bitandatu muri buri ndege bya santimetero 200 z’uburebure na santimetero 58 z’ubugari.
Kuri buri gitanda hazajya haba hariho umusego, amashuka, utwuma dutuma utumva urusaku, ndetse n’umwenda ukingira uburiri (rideaux). Air New Zealand yatangaje ko igitekereza niba izongeraho n’ibindi bikoresho nk’aho gucomeka telefone, n’itara ritanga urumuri ruhagije ku buryo umuntu yabasha gusoma.
Ushinzwe ibikorwa byo kwamamaza muri Air New Zealand, Mike Tod yavuze ko ubwo buryo bw’ibitanda buzaba bugenewe cyane cyane abakiliya bajya mu byerekezo birebire aho bibasaba amasaha menshi mu ndege, nk’urugendo rwa Auckland –New York izatangiza umwaka utaha ruzajya rufata amasaha 17 n’iminota 40.
Ikiguzi cya Skynet ntikiramenyekana ariko ubuyobozi bwa Air New Zealand bwatangaje ko kizajya kiba kiri ukwacyo, ntaho gihuriye n’itike y’indege isanzwe nk’uko The Guardian yabitangaje.
Hari n’ubundi buryo buzajya bukoreshwa, aho uri mu ndege ashaka kuryama ashobora kubisaba akishyura, akagenda akaryama amasaha cyangwa iminota mike. Air New Zealand yatangaje ko abakozi bo mu ndege bazajya baba bari hafi ku buryo mu gihe umuntu umwe abyutse, bahita bategura uburiri ku buryo undi ushaka kuryama abukoresha.
Haracyategerejwe uburenganzira kugira ibyo bitanda bitangire gushyirwa mu ndege za Air New Zealand.
Mu gihe ubu buryo buzaba bwemejwe, iyo sosiyete ivuga ko izahita itangira kubugurisha no ku zindi sosiyete z’indege.
Air New Zealand siyo ya mbere itangiye kuzana udushya tugamihe gushimisha abakiliya bayo mu ngendo kuko nk’umwaka ushize, sosiyete Collins Aerospace ikora iby’indege yatangije uburyo bw’uko mu gihe indege ihagurutse, hafi y’amadirishya n’inzugi zayo hazajya hihindura nk’akabari , abakiliya bakagenda baganira bafata n’icyo kunywa.

Title: Liquid Telecom yagabanyije ibiciro bya internet inakuraho ingano ntarengwa y’iyo ukoresha
Body:
Ikigo gitanga itumanaho rya internet mu Rwanda, Liquid Telecom, cyakoze impinduka mu buryo kigeza internet ku bantu, kigabanya ibiciro, kizamura umuvuduko wa internet ndetse kinakuraho uburyo umuntu yagenerwaga ingano runaka agomba gukoresha.
Ikigo gitanga itumanaho rya internet mu Rwanda, Liquid Telecom, cyakoze impinduka mu buryo kigeza internet ku bantu, kigabanya ibiciro, kizamura umuvuduko wa internet ndetse kinakuraho uburyo umuntu yagenerwaga ingano runaka agomba gukoresha.
Kuri uyu wa Gatatu nibwo iki kigo cyatangije uburyo cyise ‘Liquid Home’, buzafasha abantu kubyaza umusaruro internet imaze iminsi yegerezwa ingo z’abaturage hiryo no hino mu gihugu, kandi ku giciro gito.
Mu mpinduka nshya, ku muntu ukoresha internet itanga megabits eshanu ku isegonda ari nayo iri hasi, guhera kuri ubu asabwa kwishyura 27 999 Frw, mu gihe ubusanzwe yishyuraga 49 999 Frw. Ku bindi byiciro ho hazamuwe umuvuduko wayo, ibiciro biguma ari bya bindi.
Hejuru y’ibyo, mbere yo guhabwa internet umuntu yasabwaga kwishyura 50 000 Frw yo kuyimugezaho mu nzu iwe, ubu ayo mafaranga yavanweho. Ni ukuvuga ko uwasabwaga hafi hafi 100 000 Frw ngo agezweho internet, ubu ni 27 999 Frw.
Umuyobozi Mukuru wa Liquid Telecom muri Afurika yo hagati n’Iburasirazuba, Sam Nkusi, avuga ko bamaze igihe begereza internet ingo n’izindi nyubako binyuze mu miyoboro ya fibres optiques yagiye yagiye inyuzwa mu butaka hirya no hino.
Uretse nk’imidugudu imaze igihe ituwe, iyubakwa ubu, uko hashyirwamo ibikorwa remezo nk’imiyoboro y’amazi n’amashanyarazi, ni nako hashyirwamo iya internet.
Nkusi yakomeje ati “Twageze ku ngo, aho abantu batuye dushyiraho insinga za fibres optique. Nureba ku muhanda iwawe uzabona urutsinga rutukura rutunguka hejuru. Twabitangaga mbere twishyuza n’abantu, ubu nta mafaranga kugira ngo tugushyireho ube umukiliya wacu, tugusaba ubwishyu bwa internet ukeneye gusa.”
Avuga ko bitewe n’uko mu Rwanda igice kinini ari urubyiruko, rukeneye internet ihendutse bijyanye n’amikoro ya buri wese, kandi idacika.
Umuyobozi wa Liquid Telecom mu Rwanda, Alexis Kabeja, avuga ko uretse kugabanya ibiciro ku cyiciro cyo hasi, ku bindi ho hazamuwe umuvuduko wa internet.
Ati "Abakiliya basanzwe twabongereye umuvuduko wa internet, ni ukuvuga ngo uwakoreshaga iya Mbps 15 ku 69 999 Frw, twazamuye umuvuduko tuwugeza kuri Mbps 25, naho uwari ku ya Mbps 30 twamugejeje kuri Mbps 80. Abakiliya bari basanzwe twabazamuriye umuvuduko kugira ngo babashe gukora byinshi bishoboka.”
"Ni ukuvuga ngo twabahaye kuyikoresha nta ngano ntarengwa itanzwe, kubera ko kuba ufite Mbps 80 mu rugo ushobora gukora byinshi, kuri telefoni, televiziyo zikoresha internet, camera z’umutekano, gukurikirana ibibera mu rugo, kwerekana ibintu kuri internet, ariko icy’ingenzi ni internet idafite umupaka, ikaza yihuta kandi ku giciro cyoroheye abantu benshi."
Kugeza ubu imiyoboro ya fibres optiques imaze kugezwa mu midugudu myinshi cyane cyane mu mujyi wa Kigali nka Gacuriro, Gisozi, Kacyiru, Kagugu, Kibagabaga, Kimihurura, Kinyinya, Kiyovu, Nyarutarama, Rebero, Rugando, Remera, Vision 2020 na Vision City, ndetse n’ahandi irimo kubakwa.
Liquid Telecom imaze kubaka ibikorwa hirya no hino muri Afurika, aho yamaze gukora imiyoboro ikwirakwiza internet ihuza Cape Town muri Afurika y’Epfo na Cairo mu Misiri, no kuva kuri Port Sudan ukagera muri Cameroon.
Iteganya gukwirakwiza internet n’ahantu hahurira abantu benshi nko muri Kigali Arena, mu busitani imbere y’Umujyi wa Kigali n’ahandi, kandi bigakorwa ku buntu.
Liquid Telecom ivuga ko internet ihabwa abantu mu ngo inajyana no kuyishyirirwa mu nyubako ku buntu, igikoresho gisakaza internet nziramugozi na telefoni ikoresha umugozi ishobora guhamagaragana n’izindi zatanzwe n’iki kigo, ku buntu.
Abakeneye izi serivisi basabwa kureba niba aho batuye hagera fibres optiques, ubundi bagahitamo bitewe na internet bakeneye, kandi gusaba kuyihabwa babikorera kuri internet, ndetse no kwishyura bishobora gukorwa hifashishijwe ikarita cyangwa mobile money.
Mu byiciro bya internet itangwa na Liquid Telecom habanza icyiciro gihendutse kurusha ibindi (Basic essential), aho internet itanga Megabits eshanu ku isegonda igurwa 27 999 Frw ku kwezi, igenewe umuryango (Family Entertainment) itanga Megabits 25 ku isegonda igurwa 69 999 Frw ku kwezi, hakaza iyisumbuye kurushaho (Modern Family) itanga Megabits 80 ku isegonda igurwa 113 999 Frw ku kwezi, n’ihanitse (Power Pack) itanga Megabits 150 ku isegonda igurwa 199 999 Frw.
Amafoto: Himbaza Pacifique

Title: Alibaba yatangije ikoranabuhanga ryo kwisuzumisha indwara ku buntu
Body:
Alibaba imenyerewe mu bucuruzi bwo kuri internet, yatangije serivisi y’ikoranabuhanga yo gusuzuma uburwayi ku buntu, hagamijwe kugabanya igitutu ku bitaro kirimo guturuka ku ikwirakwira rya virusi ya Coronavirus.
Alibaba imenyerewe mu bucuruzi bwo kuri internet, yatangije serivisi y’ikoranabuhanga yo gusuzuma uburwayi ku buntu, hagamijwe kugabanya igitutu ku bitaro kirimo guturuka ku ikwirakwira rya virusi ya Coronavirus.
Abakoresha iyi serivisi bazajya babasha gusuzumwa banabone amakuru kuri iki cyorezo ku gihe, hirya no hino mu gihugu binyuze ku rubuga rwa Alibaba ruzwi nka Taobao cyangwa kuri application ya telefoni yo kwishyuriraho yitwa Alipay.
Amagana y’abaganga bo hirya no hino mu gihugu barimo gutanga serivisi zo gusuzuma binyuze kuri iyi application, aho muri bo abarenga 70%, ari inzobere mu bijyanye n’indwara z’ubuhumekero n’ubuvuzi rusange.
Kugera Saa Sita z’amanywa zo ku cyumweru, iyi serivisi yari imaze kwakira hafi abantu 400 000, nyuma y’amasaha 24 itangijwe. Abagera kuri 97% byabo ni abo mu ntara ya Hubei mu Bushinwa aho icyorezo cya Coronavirus, cyugarije cyane.
Abarenga 90% barabaza ku buryo bwo kwirinda no kwivuza icyorezo cya Coronavirus n’ibihaha.
Ikigo Alibaba cyashinzwe mu 1999 n’umuherwe w’Umushinwa, Jack Ma, ubu kikaba kibarirwa mu gaciro ka miliyari 460 z’amadolari.

Title: Ikoranabuhanga rishya rishobora gutuma tugera kuri Mars vuba
Body:
Abahanga mu ikoranababuhanga batangiye kwiga uburyo bushya bwakwifashishwa mu koroshya urugendo ruva ku Isi rugana kuri Mars.
Abahanga mu ikoranababuhanga batangiye kwiga uburyo bushya bwakwifashishwa mu koroshya urugendo ruva ku Isi rugana kuri Mars.
Impamvu y’ubu buvumbuzi bushya buri gukorwa irumvikana. Ni uko inzira ziganisha ku mpera y’Isi na Mars zose zisaba kuzenguruka ukwezi, harimo intera ndende iri hagati y’ibilometero miliyoni 54.6 na 401.
Ubutumwa bwo kujya kuri Mars bukorwa mu gihe iyi mibumbe yombi isa n’iyegeranye. Bifata amezi nibura icyenda kugira ngo umuntu agere kuri Mars hifashishijwe ‘rocket’ zigenda ziyongera umuvuduko uko zikora urugendo.
Icyo gihe bisaba ngo umuntu agere kuri Mars ni kirekire ku buryo bigoye ngo akimare ari mu rugendo. Abahanga barimo abo mu Kigo cya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika gikora Ubushakashatsi mu isanzure, Nasa, bari mu bushakashatsi kugira ngo bakore ikintu gishobora kwihuta mu kugera kuri Mars.
Mu ikoranabuhanga riri kwigwaho, harimo iryifashisha ingufu z’izuba.
Abahanga mu by’isanzure bari gukora ku mushinga wo gukora icyo umuntu yagereranya n’icyogajuru ariko cyifashisha ingufu z’izuba mu mushinga wiswe Solar Electric Propulsion, SEP.
Iri koranabuhanga ryitezweho ko rishobora kwifashishwa mu kohereza imizigo kuri Mars mbere y’uko habaho urugendo rw’umuntu. Ibyo byafasha ko abahanga mu bumenyi bw’ikirere bagerayo bagasanga hariyo ibikoresho byose bakeneye, gusa bo bagenda bakoresheje ‘rocket’ zisanzwe.
Uko uyu mushinga uteye ni uko icyo bazohereza kuri Mars kizaba gifite ubushobozi bwo gufata ingufu z’izuba kikazibyaza amashanyarazi asanzwe.
Ubusanzwe iyo icyogajuru cyoherejwe mu kirere kiba gikoresha ingufu zingana na kilowatt ziri hagati ya 10 na 15, ariko abahanga bari gushaka kuzongera nibura ku buryo zagera kuri Kw 50.
Ikibazo kiriho ubu ni ubushobozi bw’imizigo icyogajuru gikoresha imirasire y’izuba cyakoherezwa cyaba gifite kuko ubusanzwe ibintu bikoresha imirasi bikora neza iyo bitwaye ibintu bitaremereye cyane.
Ikindi gitekerezo ni ukwifashisha ibyogajuru bikoresha ingufu za nucléaire ku buryo bihaguruka ku Isi bigafungira amaferi kuri Mars.

Title: Hagiye gukorwa impinduka mu mikorere ya Bluetooth bwa mbere mu myaka 20
Body:
Bluetooth igiye gukora impinduka mu mikorere yayo ku nshuro ya mbere mu myaka 20, zizatuma uburyo amajwi yayo yumvikana buba bwiza kurushaho.
Bluetooth igiye gukora impinduka mu mikorere yayo ku nshuro ya mbere mu myaka 20, zizatuma uburyo amajwi yayo yumvikana buba bwiza kurushaho.
Impinduka za mbere zizagaragazwa n’uburyo amajwi asohorwa n’ibikoresho byifashisha Bluetooth [écouteur] azajya aba ayunguruye kurusha mbere, bikajyana n’ikoranabuhanga rishya mu twumvisho [écouteur] dukoresha ubu buryo. Bizanajyana n’uburryo umuriro uzajya ugenda ari muke ugereranyije n’ibisanzwe.
Iri koranabuhanga ryiswe Bluetooth LE (LE isobanura Low Energy ni ukuvuga Bluetooth idatwara umuriro mwinshi) rizatuma abantu bashobora no gusangizanya ibyo bari kumva bakoresheje igikoresho kimwe.
Ni ukuvuga ngo niba uri kumva umuziki kuri écouteur zawe, ukaba ushobora gusangiza undi muntu nawe agafatira ku yawe akumva.
Ibyo bizafasha abantu benshi kumva nk’indirimbo imwe cyangwa ikindi kintu kimwe. Nko mu gitaramo cyangwa ahandi hateraniye abantu benshi, ubu buryo buzafasha ko abantu benshi bumva ibintu bimwe buri muntu ari ukwe, ariko aho amajwi ari kuva ari ku gikoresho kimwe bafatiyeho.
Abantu bafite ubumuga bwo kutumva nabo iri koranabuhanga rishya rya Bluetooth mu gihe gito rizashyirwa mu twumvisho tubafasha kumva.
LE Audio ikora kuri écouteur zikoresha Bluetooth kandi ku muntu wari uzisanganywe ntabwo ashobora kurishyiramo, ahubwo bimusaba kugura inshya zizashyirwa mu isoko mu minsi mike.

Title: StarTimes yashyizeho uburyo bworoshye bwo kugura ifatabuguzi rya televiziyo hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga
Body:
Sosiyete ya StarTimes yashyizeho uburyo bw’ikoranabuhanga bworoshye bushobora kwifashishwa n’abakiliya bayo mu kugura ifatabuguzi (abonnement) mu bihe abaturarwanda basabwe kuguma mu rugo birinda Coronavirus.
Sosiyete ya StarTimes yashyizeho uburyo bw’ikoranabuhanga bworoshye bushobora kwifashishwa n’abakiliya bayo mu kugura ifatabuguzi (abonnement) mu bihe abaturarwanda basabwe kuguma mu rugo birinda Coronavirus.
StarTimes yatangaje ko kuri ubu bitakiri ngombwa gukora ingendo umuntu ajya kugura ifatabuguzi no guhererekanya amafaranga mu ntoki. Yashyizeho uburyo bwo kwishyura hakoreshejwe ikoranabuhanga bagura abonnement burimo MTN Mobile Money, Pivot, Equity, BPR, Gcom, FDI, ndetse irateganya ko mu minsi ya vuba izatangira gukorana na BK, Airtel Money na Mobicash.
Iyi sosiyete yatangaje ko umuntu wahuje ikarita ye na dekoderi bya StarTimes na StarTimes ON application, ashobora kwishyuza cyangwa agahindura bouquet akoresheje telefoni ye.
Umuyobozi Mukuru wa StarTimes, Deng Sanming, yagize ati “Nk’ikigo cya mbere kigurisha isakazamashusho muri Afurika, StarTimes igamije gutanga umusanzu mu mutekano w’abaturage muri ibi bihe bidasanzwe. Kureba neza batavuye mu rugo kugira ngo babone kandi bishimire imyidagaduro, amakuru na gahunda z’uburezi, ni intambwe yo gushyigikira ubuzima bwiza. “
Yongeyeho ati “Twizera ko imyitwarire myiza yose ishobora kuganisha ku mubiri muzima no mu bitekerezo byiza.”
Sanming yavuze ko ikoranabuhanga ryose rikoreshwa mu kwishyura ifatabuguzi rya StarTimes rizafasha abakiliya bayo gutuza no kuguma mu rugo bafite ubuzima bwiza.
Guhererekanya amafaranga no kwishyura hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga ni bumwe mu buryo Banki Nkuru y’Igihugu (BNR) yasabye ko bwimakazwa muri ibi bihe hafashwe ingamba zikomeye zo guhangana n’ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus.

Title: Ubushakashatsi bwagaragaje uburyo bushya bwo kwica agakoko gatera igituntu
Body:
Abashakashatsi bagaragaje ko agakoko gatera igituntu kugira ngo kabeho, gakenera intungamubiri zizwi nk’ubutare (fer). Mu gihe hahagaritswe inzira ijyana ubutare aho agakoko kari, igituntu ntigishibora gukura ngo gishegeshe abantu.
Abashakashatsi bagaragaje ko agakoko gatera igituntu kugira ngo kabeho, gakenera intungamubiri zizwi nk’ubutare (fer). Mu gihe hahagaritswe inzira ijyana ubutare aho agakoko kari, igituntu ntigishibora gukura ngo gishegeshe abantu.
Ibi byagaragaje uburyo bushya bushobora kwifashishwa n’abahanga mu gukora imiti y’igituntu no kugihashya kitarangiza abantu.
Abashakashatsi bagaragaje ko iyo agakoko gatera igituntu kabuze ubutare (fer) kadashobora gukura.
Igituntu giterwa n’agakoko kazwi nka Mycobacterium tuberculosis, kandi kaboneka kenshi mu mubiri w’umuntu.
Abashakashatsi bizeye ko ubushakashatsi bushya buzafasha mu gushaka umuti nyawo uhangana n’indwara y’igituntu.
Markus Seeger, umwarimu mu ishami ry’ubuvuzi muri Kaminuza ya Zurich (UZH), akaba no mu itsinda ryakoze ubushakashatsi yavuze ko basanze ako gakoko gatera igituntu iyo kageze mu mubiri gacura utundi turemangingo intungamubiri z’ubutare.
Seeger yavuze ko babashije guhagarika utunyangingo duto twitwa IrtAB dutwara ubutare tubujyana mu gakoko gatera igituntu, kadashobora gukura cyangwa kakaba kanapfa, bityo igituntu ntikizahaze abantu.
Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye ryita ku Buzima (OMS), ryatangaje ko umwaka ushize abantu miliyoni 1.5 bishwe n’indwara zibasira ibihaha n’igituntu kirimo.

Title: Smartphone zishobora guhenda muri EAC mu mezi atandatu ya 2020
Body:
Isoko rya telefone zigezweho muri Afurika y’Iburasirazuba (EAC) biteganyijwe ko rizagabanyuka ku kigero cya 12% mu mezi atatu ya mbere ya 2020 na 3% mu mezi atatu azakurikiraho.
Isoko rya telefone zigezweho muri Afurika y’Iburasirazuba (EAC) biteganyijwe ko rizagabanyuka ku kigero cya 12% mu mezi atatu ya mbere ya 2020 na 3% mu mezi atatu azakurikiraho.
Ibyo bivuze ko telefone za smartphone zinjira mu karere zizaba nke, igiciro cyazo kikazamuka kubera ibibazo biri mu gutumiza ibikoresho by’ikoranabuhanga bitewe n’icyorezo cya coronavirus.
Biteganyijwe ko isoko rizakomeza kugenda nabi mu mezi atandatu ya 2020, ibintu bizasubira mu buryo mu gihembwe cya gatatu n’icya Kane by’umwaka nabwo nihagira igikorwa ngo icyorezo gihagarikwe, ubucuruzi busubire uko bwahoze.
Raporo y’ikigo cy’ubushakashatsi, International Data Corporation (IDC) igaragaza ko umubare wa telefone zigezweho zizinjira muri EAC uyu mwaka uzagabanukaho 1.6 % ugereranyije n’izinjiye umwaka ushize.
Ugereranyije na telefone zigezweho zinjiye muri Kenya umwaka ushize, mu mezi atandatu ya mbere ya 2020 zizagabanukaho 10 % kandi ibiciro byiyongere.
Umwaka ushize muri Kenya, Uganda na Tanzania telefone zigezweho zinjiye muri ibyo bihugu zari miliyoni 10.7, zivuye kuri telefone miliyoni 9.4 zinjiye mu 2018.
Ibihugu byo mu karere bifite isoko rito rya telefone, raporo ivuga ko bizagerwaho n’ingaruka nyinshi kuko ibigo bicuruza n’ibiranguza telefone bizaba bishishikajwe n’amasoko manini nka Kenya ari naho bashobora kohereza telefone nyinshi mu gihe cya coronavirus.
Uretse telefone kandi n’ibindi byuma by’ikoranabuhanga nka televiziyo, firigo n’bindi bizahenda kuko abari bafite ububiko bwabyo mbere y’uko icyorezo cya coronavirus gikwirakwira, ubu mu bubiko bigiye gushira. Ikindi ni uko muri Mutarama mu Bushinwa bari mu birori byo kwizihiza umwaka mushya ku buryo inganda zitakoraga, hiyongereyeho n’icyorezo cya coronavirus cyacaga ibintu muri icyo gihugu.
Raporo igaragaza ko telefone zicuruzwa muri Afurika y’Iburasirazuba ziganjemo iz’inganda zo mu Bushinwa nka Tecno, Itel, Infinix, Xiaomi na Huawei kuko bigize 85 % bya telefone zose zicuruzwa mu karere. Samsung na Nokia ni ubundi bwoko bwa telefone zicuruzwa muri EAC.
Bagaragaza ko coronavirus ishobora no kugira ingaruka ku gushyira hanze telefone nshya kuko hari bimwe mu bikoresho byifashishwa mu gukora telefone bitari kubasha kugera ku nganda kuko biva hanze y’u Bushinwa.

Title: COVID-19: MTN yasobanuye impamvu hari aho internet igenda buhoro n’ingamba zo kubikemura
Body:
Sosiyete y’itumanaho ya MTN Rwanda yatangaje ko abakoresha imiyoboro yayo biyongereye muri iyi minsi abaturarwanda basabwe kuguma mu rugo, ku buryo byatumye imiyoboro imwe n’imwe ikoreshwa cyane, internet cyangwa guhamagara bikagenda gahoro.
Sosiyete y’itumanaho ya MTN Rwanda yatangaje ko abakoresha imiyoboro yayo biyongereye muri iyi minsi abaturarwanda basabwe kuguma mu rugo, ku buryo byatumye imiyoboro imwe n’imwe ikoreshwa cyane, internet cyangwa guhamagara bikagenda gahoro.
MTN Rwanda yatangaje ko igiye kwagura imiyoboro imwe n’imwe mu maguru mashya kugira ngo icyo kibazo gikemuke.
Hashize iminsi bamwe mu bakoresha MTN Rwanda bavuga ko bafite ikibazo cya internet igenda gahoro cyangwa bahamagara amajwi akazamo ibibazo.
MTN Rwanda yatangaje ko intandaro y’uko kugenda gahoro, yaturutse ku bwiyongere bw’abakoresha imiyoboro yayo, kuko mu minsi mike ishize hafashwe ingamba zo kuguma mu ngo, ikoreshwa ry’imiyoboro ya MTN ryiyongereyeho 40 %.
MTN ivuga ko mu bice bituwe hari aho ubwo bwiyongere bwazamutse, bwikuba kabiri ugereranyije n’uko imiyoboro yabo yakoreshwaga mu minsi isanzwe.
Ibinyujije kuri Twitter, MTN yagize iti “Ubu bwiyongere buri hirya no hino ku Isi ku bigo by’itumanaho. Kwiyongera kw’abakoresha umuyoboro byateye umuvundo ku buryo mu duce tumwe na tumwe abakiliya bari guhura na internet igenda gahoro.”
Umuyobozi w’Ishami ry’Ikoranabuhanga muri MTN Rwanda, Ndatira Fabrice, yavuze ko imiyoboro imwe n’imwe mu Mujyi wa Kigali igiye kwagurwa kugira ngo ibashe guhaza abayikoresha bose.
Mu Mujyi wa Kigali, imiyoboro izagurwa bitarenze tariki 30 Mata 2020 naho mu bice byo hanze ya Kigali izagurwa bitarenze Gicurasi na Kamena uyu mwaka.
Mu Karere ka Gasabo imiyoboro izagurwa mu duce 27 dutandukanye tugize ako karere, muri Kicukiro izagurwa mu duce 17, Nyarugenge izagurwa mu duce 10.
Bamwe mu batanze ibitekerezo babicishije kuri Twitter ya MTN Rwanda, bagaragaje ko uduce twa Kicukiro nka Samuduha, Kanombe-Kabeza, Nyamirambo muri Nyarugenge n’ahandi ari hamwe mu hari ikibazo cyo kugenda gahoro kwa Internet.
Ndatira mu kubasubiza yagize ati “Gukoreshwa kw’imiyoboro yacu kwariyongereye mu duce tumwe na tumwe. Twatangiye kwagura iyo miyoboro. Kabeza iri mu duce turi bwagure imiyoboro yacu. Turaza kwihutisha iki gikorwa, turizera ko bizakemura ikibazo cyawe.”
Ndatira yavuze ko bumwe mu buryo bashobora gukoresha bagura imiyoboro ya MTN Rwanda, nko ku bakoresha Internet harimo kongeraho imiyoboro yindi (carriers) ifasha isanzweho mu gihe abayikoresha babaye benshi.
Yijeje ko internet izihuta imiyoboro nimara kwagurwa. Ati “Mu kwagura imiyoboro yacu, turizera ko internet izihuta kurushaho.”
MTN Rwanda ni sosiyete yageze bwa mbere mu Rwanda mu 1998, ikaba ari nayo ifite abakiliya benshi kuko imibare iheruka y’Urwego Ngenzuramikorere, RURA, yerekana ko ifite abafatabuguzi basaga miliyoni enye.

Title: Mercedes igiye gukora imashini zihariye zifasha abarwaye coronavirus guhumeka
Body:
Abahanga mu by’ubuvuzi mu Bwongereza bafatanyije n’uruganda rwa Mercedes, bagiye gukora imashini ishobora gutanga umwuka ku murwayi wa coronavirus, hadakenewe imashini yari isanzwe izwi nka ventilator ifasha umurwayi guhumeka mu gihe ageze ahakomeye.
Abahanga mu by’ubuvuzi mu Bwongereza bafatanyije n’uruganda rwa Mercedes, bagiye gukora imashini ishobora gutanga umwuka ku murwayi wa coronavirus, hadakenewe imashini yari isanzwe izwi nka ventilator ifasha umurwayi guhumeka mu gihe ageze ahakomeye.
Ventilators ni imashini ubu zikenewe n’ibihugu byose mu kuba byafasha abarembejwe n’iki cyorezo, ariko zirahenze ku buryo kuzibona bigoye.
BBC yatangaje ko utumashini tuzwi nka Continuous Positive Airway Pressure (CPAP) zirimo gukoreshwa kugeza ubu ariko ari nke ugereranyije n’izikenewe.
Ibihugu by’u Bushinwa n’u Butaliyani byakoresheje izi mashini mu gufasha abarwayi ba Covid-19 kandi ngo byatanze umusaruro ukomeye.
Kugeza ubu utu dukoresho tugera kuri 40 twagejejwe mu bitaro byo mu Bwongereza.
Mercedes ivuga ko ishaka kujya ikora ibi izi mashini zigera ku 1000 ku munsi.
Amakuru ava mu Butaliyani igihugu cyugarijwe cyane na coronavuris, avuga ko abarwayi bangana na 50% bahawe utu twuma, byatumye batagera ku rwego rwo gukenera imashini yisumbuye ibafasha guhumeka mu bihe bikomeye (ventilator).
Prof Mervyn Singer ukora mu kigo University College London, avuga ko “Kugira utu tumashini bizatuma abarwayi batagera ku rwego rwo gukoresha imashini zibafasha guhumeka cyane kuko ari nke, zikaba zakoreshwa ku bandi barembye cyane.”
BBC ivuga ko aka kuma gafashwa gusunika umwuka ku buryo ugera mu kanwa no mu mazuru y’umurwayi bitamugoye.
Kugeza ubu icyorezo cya Coronavirus kimaze kwica abantu hafi ibihumbi 40 ku Isi, mu gihe abandi barenga ibihumbi 750 bamaze kwandura.

Title: Tuuza bundle, ipaki ya internet yakwifashishwa muri iki gihe cya Coronavirus
Body:
Sositeye y’Itumanaho ya MTN Rwanda izwiho cyane guteza imbere ikoranabuhanga, ikomeje gutanga ibyiza byinshi byafasha abanyarwanda kumenya amakuru y’ababo, kuganira no gukora akazi buri wese ari iwe mu rugo mu rwego rwo kwirinda coronavirus.
Sositeye y’Itumanaho ya MTN Rwanda izwiho cyane guteza imbere ikoranabuhanga, ikomeje gutanga ibyiza byinshi byafasha abanyarwanda kumenya amakuru y’ababo, kuganira no gukora akazi buri wese ari iwe mu rugo mu rwego rwo kwirinda coronavirus.
MTN Rwanda ifite serivisi zo guhamagara hakoreshejwe amapaki atandukanye, hohererezanya ubutumwa bugufi, by’umwihariko muri ibi bihe byo kwirinda Coronavirus kohererezanya amafaranga nta kiguzi cy’ayo gukata umukiliya arengejeho mu gihe yishyura akoresheje Mobile Money.
Hari amapaki ya Internet atandukanye buri muntu agura bitewe n’iyo akeneye n’ibyo akeneye kuyikoresha, muri zo habamo iyitwa Tuuza bundle iri gufasha benshi muri iki gihe.
Tuuza bundle ni ipaki ya internet itanga Megabytes (Mbs) nyinshi. Nta gihe runaka imara, uhabwa Mbs ukazikoresha uko wifuza. Pack irangira ari uko izo Mbs zishize.
Hari igura Frw 200 itanga Mbs 130 igurwa umuntu akanze *345# akajya kuri 2 agakurikiza amabwiriza. Hari igura Frw 1000 itanga Mbs 800 nayo umuntu agura akanda *345# akajya kuri 2 agakurikiza amabwiriza.
Ushobora kandi gukanda *154# cyangwa *182# maze ugakurikiza amabwiriza.
Uretse iyo, hari andi mapaki menshi ya internet; arimo; ‘Irekure, (Internet Irekure) itanga Packs za 3G, 4G Irekure, Pack za 5G n’izindi nyinshi.

Title: Impamvu ‘Zoom’ yanikiye izindi porogaramu zifasha mu guhamagara cyangwa gukora inama mu ikoranabuhanga
Body:
Mu buryo busanzwe, iyo abantu bavuze urubuga nkoranyambaga rukunzwe cyane hakundaga kuza urufasha mu gusakaza amashusho, amafoto, kwibutsa isabukuru y’amavuko n’izindi.
Mu buryo busanzwe, iyo abantu bavuze urubuga nkoranyambaga rukunzwe cyane hakundaga kuza urufasha mu gusakaza amashusho, amafoto, kwibutsa isabukuru y’amavuko n’izindi.
Muri iyi minsi ibintu byahindutse kubera ko hafi ya buri wese yategetswe gukorera mu rugo kubera Coronavirus, nyamara agakomeza gukenera kuvugana n’abakozi bagenzi be, kwitabira inama z’ikigo akoramo cyangwa ayobora. Ibyo ntibirimo gukorwa na applications za Twitter, Facebook, Snapchat cyangwa TikTok. Ahubwo ni iyitwa Zoom.
Ni uburyo bwahanzwe n’umushinwa Eric Yuan mu myaka icyenda ishize, ariko ubu bwamaze guca kuri Skype na Microsoft Teams mu kwifashishwa cyane. Ni nabwo buryo inama iheruka guhuza ibihugu 20 bikize ku Isi, G20, yifashishije.
Burimo kwifashishwa kurusha ubundi bwari busanzwe nka FaceTime zikoreshwa kuri za iPhone. Ibyo bikagaragaza impamvu iki kigo cyagiye ku isoko ry’imari n’imigabane muri Mata mu mwaka, kibarirwa agaciro ka miliyari $15, ubu kigeze muri miliyari $40.
-	Zoom yoroshya ubuzima
Mu gihe kirekire, gukora inama hifashishijwe amashusho byasabaga kubanza gushyira porogaramu runaka muri mudasobwa cyangwa telefoni, ukamenya uburyo uyihuza n’igikoresho ufite, rimwe na rimwe bigasaba guca mu nzira nyinshi.
Igihe udafite application ya Zoom mu gikoresho cyawe, bizakorohera kuyishyiramo. Igihe inama irimo kubera kuri Zoom, ishobora guhurirwamo abantu bagera ku 100 buri wese ari imbere ya mudasobwa cyangwa telefoni ye, kandi umuntu akaba areba buri wese uri mu nama imbere ye.
Ubusanzwe nka Skype ku buntu yemera abantu 50, ariko Zoom igashyiraho akarusho k’uko nk’urugero niba utetse ugakenera kuvugana n’abandi, ntabwo ari ngombwa ko bakurebera igikoni, ushobora kugena uko inyuma hawe hagaragara mu maso y’abo muri kumwe mu nama.
Ni ukuvuga ko muri icyo gihe, ushobora kubigira nk’aho urimo kuganira wicaye ku mucanga cyangwa mu isanzure. Ubasha kandi kohereza ubutumwa ku muntu uhisemo cyangwa gufata amashusho y’ikiganiro kirimo kuba, ukaza kuyabika.
Umuntu aba afite igihe cy’iminota 40 cyo gukora inama, ku buryo iyo ukeneye ko irenga, umuntu ku giti cye yishyura $14.99 ku kwezi naho ikigo kikishyura $19.99.
-	Buri wese yayikoresha
Ntabwo Zoom itoranya ubushobozi bw’igikoresho cy’ikoranabuhanga. Ikora kuri mudasobwa ngendanwa, iPad, iPhone, mudasobwa yo mu biro cyangwa telefoni ikoresha Android. Ni ukuvuga ko umuntu wese, aho ari hose, ashobora kuyikoresha.
Abantu baranayishidukiye kubera ko mu byumweru bishize, Zoom yabaye application yamanuwe kuri internet (download) inshuro nyinshi kuri Apple App Store, kuko nko ku wa Mbere tariki 23 Werurwe yari imaze kumanurwa inshuro miliyoni 2.13, zivuye ku nshuro miliyoni 2.04 ku munsi wari wabanje.
Nyamara mbere y’amezi abiri yabanje, iyi porogaramu yamanurwaga inshuro zitarenze 56.000 ku munsi.
Kuva ibihugu byatangira gusaba abantu bose kuguma mu ngo, bibarwa ko abantu bamaze kuyimanura muri Google inshuro zisaga miliyoni 50.
-	Ikora mu buryo bwizewe
Urebye uburyo Zoom irimo gukoreshwa ku rwego rwo hejuru, ushobora kumva uburyo abayikoresha bayizera. Nibyo koko hagiye habamo ibibazo bike. Ariko magingo aya ikoreshwa n’inzego zinyuranye zaba iz’umutekano, ubuvuzi n’izindi.
Impungenge ariko ntizibura. Hari nk’igikorwa kirimo kwitwa "Zoombombing", aho abajura mu by’ikoranabuhanga bashobora kwinjira mu kiganiro banyuze kuri konti y’umuntu umwe, ugasanga berekanyeho amashusho atajyanye n’ibirimo kuba.
Rumwe mu ngero ziheruka gutangazwa ni uburyo banyuze ku muntu umwe bakereka abari mu nama bose amashusho y’urukozasoni.

Title: Huawei yashyize hanze telefone nshya za P40
Body:
Uruganda rukora telefone rwo mu Bushinwa, Huawei rwashyize hanze telefone nshya ziswe P40 nubwo isi ikomeje guhangana n’icyorezo cya coronavirus.
Uruganda rukora telefone rwo mu Bushinwa, Huawei rwashyize hanze telefone nshya ziswe P40 nubwo isi ikomeje guhangana n’icyorezo cya coronavirus.
Izi telefone zishyizwe hanze nyuma y’umunsi umwe urwo ruganda rutangaje ko 90 % by’abakozi barwo 150 000 hirya no hino mu Bushinwa, bagarutse ku mirimo nyuma y’igihe bari mu ngo kubera coronavirus.
Inzobere zigaragaza ko nubwo Huawei yashyize hanze izo telefone, zishobora kutagurwa cyane kuko zije mu gihe ubukungu bitifashe neza kubera coronavirus.
Ubwoko bushya bwa telefone za Huawei ntabwo burimo porogaramu za Google nka Youtube, Amakarita na Play Store kubera ko Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zabujije sosiyete zo muri icyo gihugu gukorana n’izo mu Bushinwa mu bucuruzi.
Huawei iracyari sosiyete ya kabiri igurisha telefone nyinshi ku isi nyuma ya Samsung. Huawei yari yiyemeje kuvana Samsung kuri uwo mwanya bitarenze 2019 ariko ntibyayikundiye.
Telefone za P40 zasohowe zirimo ubwoko butatu burimo P40 iringaniye, P40 pro na P40 pro+. Izo ebyiri za nyuma zifite uburebure bwa santimetero zigera kuri 16, bikaba bizigira nini kurusha iPhone 11 Pro Max ya Apple.
Ubwo bwoko bwose bwa telefone bukoresha internet ya 5G. P40 iringaniye ifite camera eshatu, na zoom ya 3x ituma umuntu ashobora gukurura ikintu kiri kure ifoto ntite ireme.
P40 Pro yo ifite zoom ya 5x ituma ifata amashusho akeye mu gihe Pro+ ifite zoom ya 10x.
Mu zindi porogaramu ziri muri izo telefone harimo TikTok, Telegram, Viber na Microsoft Office. Uretse porogaramu za Google, telefone za P40 ntizirimo Twitter, Facebook na WhatsApp.
Huawei yashyizemo indi porogaramu isimbura YouTube yiswe Huawei video. Iyi sosiyete kandi yasinye amasezerano na BBC yo kujya ihabwa video zayo.
Telefone za P40 na P40 Pro zizashyirwa ku isoko tariki 7 Mata, iya mbere ikazaba igura amadolari 890 naho iya kabiri igura amadolari 1100. Telefone za P40 Pro+ zo zizajya ku isoko muri Kamena zigura amadolari 1540.

Title: U Rwanda ku rutonde rw’ibihugu Apple yaguriyemo isoko ryayo
Body:
Uruganda rukora ibikoresho by’Ikoranabuhanga rwa Apple rwongereye umubare w’ibihugu byemerewe gukora no gukoresha applications zishyirwa muri mudasobwa, iPad na telefoni zarwo mu buryo bwemewe.
Uruganda rukora ibikoresho by’Ikoranabuhanga rwa Apple rwongereye umubare w’ibihugu byemerewe gukora no gukoresha applications zishyirwa muri mudasobwa, iPad na telefoni zarwo mu buryo bwemewe.
Ni igikorwa cyakiriwe neza n’abasanzwe bakora za applications zishyirwa mu bikoresho by’ikoranabuhanga bo mu Rwanda kuko ngo bigiye kubafasha kwagura ibikorwa byabo bijyanye no kuzikora kandi bakabona indi soko y’amafaranga batari basanganywe.
N’ubwo nta tariki nyayo Apple yatangaje ko abakora za applications bazaba bemerewe gutangira gushyira ibikorwa byabo ku rubuga rwayo, uru ruganda rwabasabye kwinjira muri konti zabo ku rubuga rwa Apple, bakemeza uburyo bushya bujyanye n’amasezerano y’imikoranire avuguruye bitarenze tariki ya 10 Mata 2020. Ibi bizatuma ngo applications zabo zibonwa n’abantu bifashisha ibikoresho bya Apple hirya no hino ku Isi igihe nikigera.
Ubusanzwe u Rwanda ntirwari mu bihugu byemerewe gukoresha no guhabwa ubufasha bujyanye na applications za Apple kuko umuntu wakeneraga kugira application agura, agurisha cyangwa ikindi gikorwa kimusaba kuzuza umwirondoro we mu ikoranabuhanga rya Apple, byamusabaga gushaka ikindi gihugu yiyitirira kugira ngo abone ibyo akeneye.
Uwashinze akaba n’Umuyobozi Mukuru w’Ikigo Khenz gikora za applications za mudasobwa na telefoni, Habineza Moussa, yavuze ko ubusanzwe u Rwanda rwari rumeze nk’ururi mu kato.
Ati ’’Ku isoko rya applications rya Apple, ba rwiyemezamirimo b’Abanyarwanda n’abandi bo mu bihugu 20 byatangajwe bari mu kato ariko ubu biratandukanye.’’
Yakomeje avuga ko Abanyarwanda basanzwe bakoresha application za Apple batazongera kwiyitirira ibindi bihugu kugira ngo bazifashishe kandi ko bazabasha kwishyura bifashishije amakarita ya banki n’umwirondoro byo mu Rwanda nta nkomyi.
Uruganda rwa Apple rwari rusanzwe rwemerera abakora za applications zijyanye n’ibikoresho byarwo rukanatanga ubufasha ku bakiliya barwo mu bihugu 155 ku Isi.
Usibye u Rwanda, ibindi bihugu biri ku rutonde rw’ibyo Apple yaguriyemo ubucuruzi bwayo ni Afghanistan, Gabon, Côte d’Ivoire, Georgie, Maldives, Serbie, Bosnie na Herzegovina, Cameroun, Iraq, Kosovo, Libya, Montenegro, Maroc, Mozambique, Myanmar, Nauru, Tonga, Zambie na Vanuatu.

Title: Urubyiruko rwakoze ikoranabuhanga rizarinda ibigo by’ubwishingizi guhombera mu manyanga akorerwa mu magaraje
Body:
Itsinda ry’abanyeshuri bane biga amasomo y’ikoranabuhanga mu ishuri ry’imyuga rya Kigali Integrated College babifashijwemo na mwarimu wabo n’ubuyobozi bw’ishuli bakoze ikoranabuhanga rya Electronics Claims Management System, ECMS rizafasha ibigo by’ubwishingizi gukuraho ibihombo baterwaga n’amanyanga abera mu igaraje igihe umukiliya wabo yakoze impanuka bagomba kumukoreshereza imodoka.
Itsinda ry’abanyeshuri bane biga amasomo y’ikoranabuhanga mu ishuri ry’imyuga rya Kigali Integrated College babifashijwemo na mwarimu wabo n’ubuyobozi bw’ishuli bakoze ikoranabuhanga rya Electronics Claims Management System, ECMS rizafasha ibigo by’ubwishingizi gukuraho ibihombo baterwaga n’amanyanga abera mu igaraje igihe umukiliya wabo yakoze impanuka bagomba kumukoreshereza imodoka.
Ibi uru rubyiruko rwabikoze rugamije gushaka igisubizo ku kibazo cy’ibihombo bikabije byibasiye ibigo by’ubwishingizi nk’uko byagiye bigaragazwa na Banki nkuru y’igihugu BNR.
Ikibazo cy’ibihombo mu bigo by’ubwishingizi cyagarutsweho cyane mu 2018,ubwo banki nkuru y’igihugu yatangazaga ko ibigo by’ubwishingizi bihomba arenga miliyari 6 buri mwaka.
Iki gihe iyi banki yagaragaje ko ibigo by’ubwishingizi byigenga byahombye miliyari 8.3 Frw mu 2013; miliyari 12.2 Frw mu 2014; miliyari 12.5 Frw mu 2015; miliyari 13.4Frw mu 2016 na miliyari 6.9 Frw mu 2017.
Mu 2017 ni bwo bwa mbere ibi bigo by’ubwishingizi byari bihombye amafaranga make angana na miliyari 6.9 Frw aho nk’ubwishingizi bw’ibinyabiziga bwari bwihariyemo igihombo cya miliyari 4.3 Frw.
Igitera ibihombo mu bwishingizi bw’ibinyabiziga
Mu busanzwe iyo umuntu akoze impanuka, Polisi iraza ikagera aho impanuka yabereye igakora raporo y’uko yagenze, ku wakoze impanuka ushaka ko ikigo cy’ubwishingizi bakorana kimwishyurira amafaranga yo gukoresha imodoka ye iyi raporo ajya kuyisaba akayijyana ku kigo cy’ubwishingizi bakorana.
Iyo ikigo cy’ubwishingizi kimaze gusuzuma iyi raporo cyohereza umugenzuzi cyahisemo kujya kureba uko imodoka yangiritse akanashaka igaraje rizayikora.
Muri ubu bwumvikane hagati y’umugenzuzi n’igaraje niho hashobora kuvuka uburiganya buhombya ibigo by’ubwishingizi, aho umugenzuzi yumvikana na nyiri igaraje akandika ibyangiritse byinshi kugira ngo n’amafaranga abe menshi.
Muri bwa buriganya, iyo nyiri igaraje amaze kwishyurwa n’ikigo cy’ubwishingizi amafaranga y’umurengera agira umubare runaka aha wa mugenzuzi.
Nyuma yo kureba no kwitegereza ibyago n’ibihombo biterwa n’iyi nzira binyuramo ngo uwakoze impanuka ikinyabiziga cye kikangirika yishyurwe, itsinda ry’abanyeshuri bane biga mu Ishuri ryigisha imyuga rya Kigali Integrated College( KIC) bakoze ikoranabuhanga bise Electronics Claims Management System, ECMS rizafasha ibigo by’ubwishingizi guhangana n’ibi bihombo.
Ni ikoranabuhanga ryakozwe na Mugiraneza Amani, Uwineza Denyse, Uwase Honorine na Irakoze Blaise bafatanyije na mwarimu wabo Iyaturemye Jean Claude.
Uko ikoranabuhanga ry’uru rubyiruko ritanga igisubizo
ECMS izafasha mu koroshya inzira byanyurangamo ngo umuntu akoresherezwe ikinyabiziga ihuza amakuru hagati ya polisi, ibigo by’ubwishingizi na nyiri imodoka ubundi amagaraje nayo ahatanire isoko ryo gukora imodoka.
 Uwase Honorine ati “iri koranabuhanga ryacu rije gukuraho iyo nzira yose ku buryo umugenzuzi ntaho azajya ahurira n’amafaranga kuko nyiri ikinyabiziga azajya abasha kwivugira uko impanuka yagenze afotore avuge ibyabaye ariko bidakuyeho raporo ya Polisi”
Ibi bizakorwa ibigo by’ubwishingizi, amagaraje ndetse n’abanyiri ibinyabiziga bafunguza konti muri iyi sisteme ya ECMS banyuze ku rubuga Www.umuhuza.rw.
Mu gihe impanuka imaze kuba Polisi izajya ikora raporo nirangiza iyishyire muri ECMS igere ku bwishingizi, nyiri ikinyabiziga nawe akore raporo ye ayoherereze ku kigo cy’ubwishingizi akoresha.
Nyuma yo kohereza ubu butumwa ibigo by’ubwishingizi nabyo bizajya bihita bibona ko hari umukiliya wabyo wakoze impanuka,ubundi bishake umugenzuzi ujya kureba uko ikinyabiziga kimeze ubundi nawe akore raporo ayihe ikigo cyamutumye.
Ikigo cy’ubwishingizi nikimara kubona ibi byose kizajya gishyira ku rubuga amafoto y’imodoka zangiriste maze amagaraje azaba yarafunguje konti muri ECMS ahatanire amasoko yo kuzikora.
Aha igaraje rizajya rivuga igihe runaka rishobora kuyikoramo n’amafaranga ryabaca, maze ibigo by’ubwishingizi nabyo bihitemo uwayikora mu gihe gito kandi ku mafaranga make.
Imodoka nirangiza gukorwa nyiri ikinyabiziga azajya kukireba ajyanye n’impuguke ivuye mu kigo cy’ubwishingizi barebe niba igaraji ryarakoze ibintu uko babyumvikanye, maze nibasanga ari byo babisinyire, ubundi nyiri igaraje yishyurwe.
Irakoze Blaise nk’umwe mu bagize itsinda ryakoze ECMS aganira na IGIHE yavuze ko iri koranabuhanga rizanafasha amagaraje atajyaga abona amasoko kubera ko abagenzuzi bari bafite amagaraje runaka bakorana bihoraho ariko ubu bakazabasha kuyabona kuko ipiganwa rizajya riba mu mu mucyo.
Kugeza uyu munsi iri koranabuhanga ryamaze kugenzurwa n’ubuyobozi w’Ishyirahamwe ry’ibigo by’ubwishingizi mu Rwanda, ASSAR, hakaba hasigaye kwegera ibindi bigo bireba rikabona gutangira gukoreshwa kumugaragaro.

Title: Apple yafunze amaduka yayo yose ku isi uretse mu Bushinwa
Body:
Uruganda rukora telefone n’ibindi bikoresho by’ikoranabuhanga, Apple rwatangaje ko rubaye rufunze amaduka yarwo hirya no hino ku Isi uretse mu Bushinwa, hagamijwe kurinda abakozi barwo icyorezo cya Coronavirus gikomeje guhungabanya Isi.
Uruganda rukora telefone n’ibindi bikoresho by’ikoranabuhanga, Apple rwatangaje ko rubaye rufunze amaduka yarwo hirya no hino ku Isi uretse mu Bushinwa, hagamijwe kurinda abakozi barwo icyorezo cya Coronavirus gikomeje guhungabanya Isi.
Uru ruganda rufite amaduka menshi ku isi, rwiyemeje no gutanga miliyoni 15 z’amadolari mu gufasha guhangana na coronavirus.
Apple yihaye ibyumweru bibiri kugeza kuwa 27 Werurwe akaba ari bwo izatangaza niba abakozi bayo bakomeza kuguma mu rugo cyangwa basubira mu kazi.
Mu bice bidatuwe cyane aho abakozi bashobora kujya ku kazi, Apple yatangaje ko bazakomeza gukora ariko bakigengesera cyane kubera coronavirus.
Impamvu mu Bushinwa amaduka arakomeza gukora ni uko umubare w’abandura coronavirus ukomeje kugabanyuka.
Kuri uyu wa Gatanu amaduka 42 ya Apple yafunguwe mu Bushinwa nyuma y’ukwezi afunzwe.
Muri Gashyantare nibwo Apple yabaye ihagaritse ibikorwa byayo mu Bushinwa ubwo icyo gihugu cyari cyahagaritse ibikorwa mu mijyi myinshi kugira ngo kibashe guhangana na coronavirus.
Byagize ingaruka z’ubukungu kuri Apple kuko telefone urwo ruganda rwagurishije muri Gashyantare 2020 zagabanyutseho kimwe cya kabiri ugereranyije n’izo rwagurishije mu kwezi nk’uko umwaka ushize.
Ikindi cyashegeshe Apple ni uko zimwe mu nganda zo mu Bushinwa zikora ibikoresho byifashishwa muri telefone zayo zari zabaye zihagaritse imirimo.
Apple itangaza ko muri Gashyantare yagurishije telefone za iPhones 494,000 mu Bushinwa ugereranyije na iPhones miliyoni 1.27 zagurishijwe muri Gashyantare umwaka ushize.

Title: Isi y’uburyohe ku rubyiruko ruri munsi y’imyaka 25 rukoresha MTN Yolo
Body:
Hashize igihe urubyiruko ruri munsi y’imyaka 25, rukoresha umuyoboro wa MTN Rwanda rwishimira poromosiyo ya MTN Yolo irufasha kubasha kubona pack zitandukanye ku mafaranga make cyane.
Hashize igihe urubyiruko ruri munsi y’imyaka 25, rukoresha umuyoboro wa MTN Rwanda rwishimira poromosiyo ya MTN Yolo irufasha kubasha kubona pack zitandukanye ku mafaranga make cyane.
MTN Yolo ni gahunda yashyiriweho urubyiruko ruri hagati y’imyaka 16 na 24, itanga uburyo bwihariye burimo gukoresha pack yo guhamagara na Internet yiswe “Yolo Pack”, byose bikaza ari byinshi ugereranyije n’amapaki ahabwa abandi batari muri iyo myaka.
Iyo urebye abenshi mu rubyiruko bakoresha MTN Yolo uyu munsi, usanga bamwe bakiri abanyeshuri abandi nta kazi cyangwa ubundi buryo babonamo amafaranga bafite.
Bamwe mu bakoresha iyi gahunda ya MTN Yolo bavuga ko ibafasha kwisanzura bahamagara inshuti n’abavandimwe kandi bakanagura pack za internet ku mafaranga make.
Ishimwe Aimée avuga ko MTN Yolo yamworohereje kubona pack zo guhamagara ku mafaranga make cyane ndetse ko pack za internet zo zamushyize mu munyenga.
Ati “MTN Yolo ni gahunda idufasha cyane nk’urubyiriko, by’umwihariko nkatwe nk’abanyeshuri wabaga ufite nk’igiceri cy’ijana ukibaza ukuntu uribubone ama-inite yo guhanagara ariko Yolo yarabikemuye. Ibyo kugura pack ya internet byo bikaba umunyenga.”
Karasira Eric wo mu karere ka Nyarugenge avuga ko MTN Yolo ari gahunda nziza yamufashije kubasha kubona pack zayo zitanga ama inite yo guhamagara atubutse ugereranyije n’izindi pack nka ISANZURE cyane ko nta mafaranga menshi aba afite.
Ati “Ibyiza bya Yolo ni uko ushobora kuba ufite amafaranga ijana ukaba wagura pack yo guhamagara itubutse cyangwa internet. Amasegonda yo guhamagara “1020” ya Yolo atandukanye n’aya ISANZURE “170” kuko bituma ubasha guhamagara abantu benshi cyane ko kubona amafaranga ari ikibazo.”
Kimwe n’abandi, Umutoniwase Aline na we utaratanzwe no gukoresha MTN Yolo avuga ko ari gahunda nziza ifasha urubyiruko kubona pack zitubutse kandi zihendutse, bityo bigatuma bisanzura mu guhamagara ndetse no gukoresha interineti y’ubuntu itangira saa sita z’ijoro bareba ibibera ku Isi.
Sosiyete y’itumanaho MTN yashyiriyeho urubyiruko iyi gahunda kugira ngo nabo bisange muri gahunda za MTN ihora hafi y’urubyiruko mu iterambere ry’igihugu. Ukoresha iyi serivisi akanda *154# kuri telefoni ye ngendanwa.

Title: Ibisubizo kuri bimwe wibaza kuri internet inyaruka ya 5G
Body:
Umuyoboro wa 5G uhanzwe amaso n’Isi kuko uzafasha cyane mu gukoresha internet ku bintu binyuranye birimo applications zihariye zisaba internet ihambaye, ibikoresho binyuranye byo mu rugo, mu bikorwa remezo, gucunga umutekano n’ibindi .
Umuyoboro wa 5G uhanzwe amaso n’Isi kuko uzafasha cyane mu gukoresha internet ku bintu binyuranye birimo applications zihariye zisaba internet ihambaye, ibikoresho binyuranye byo mu rugo, mu bikorwa remezo, gucunga umutekano n’ibindi .
Abahanga mu by’ikoranabuhanga bagaragaza ko 5G ari internet ifite imbaraga zidasanzwe zizafasha guhindura byinshi mu mibereho n’imikorere y’abantu.
CNN itangaza ko 5G izaba ifite umuvuduko uhambaye n’ubushobozi bwo kwifashishwa n’ibikoresho by’ikoranabuhanga byinshi icyarimwe kurusha uko bigenda kuri 4G LTE.
Kuva mu 2009, Huawei yo mu Bushinwa yashoye imbaraga mu gukora ikoranabuhanga rya internet yihuta ya 5G, ndetse byatumye Amerika isaba inshuti zayo gukumira iki kigo kuba byakoresha udukoresho twacyo dutanga murandasi ya 5G, itinya ko ikoranabuhanga ryayo rishobora gukoreshwa mu gutata abakiliya bayo.
Muri Gicurasi 2019, Huawei yashyizwe mu bigo bitemerewe gukorera muri Amerika n’inzego z’umutekano, inabuzwa kugura ibikoresho byakorewe muri Amerika itabiherewe uburenganzira.
Internet ya 5G yatangiye gukoreshwa muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika no mu bindi bice by’Isi mu 2018, ariko ntirasakara henshi. Ibigo byinshi biriruka amasigamana ngo bitangize 5G ndetse ibihugu nabyo birahirimbanira kuza ku isonga y’ibizayikoresha ikagera ku bantu bose.
Impamvu y’uku kurushanwa ni uko 5G yitezweho kugaragaza impinduka zidasanzwe mu ishoramari, ibikorwaremezo n’ibijyanye n’ubwirinzi.
Internet ya 5G ifite ikoranabuhanga riyifasha guhaza ibikoresho byinshi; izagabanya igihe telefoni yamaraga ngo yakire ubusabe buyishoboza gutangira gukoresha internet mu gihe yagaburiwe n’indi; izanoza, inoroshye ihanahana ry’amakuru muri porogaramu za Amazon Web Services na Microsoft Azure.
Umuyoboro wa 5G usakaza internet hifashishijwe radio zabugenewe n’ibindi bikoresho nk’iminara ishyirwa ku nyubako yubakwa bijyanye n’aho izakoreshwa.
Ihuriro ry’Ibigo bikora mu bijyanye n’Ikoranabuhanga rya Telefoni, GSMA, ryatangaje ko 5G ifite umuvuduko uhambaye ushobora gukuba inshuro 10 internet ya 4G LTE.
Ikigo cy’ikoranabuhanga cyo muri Suède, Ericsson, gifatanyije n’ibindi bigo birimo SK Telecom na BMW Korea, cyakurikiranye imodoka ikoresha internet, yirukankaga ku bilometero 170 ku isaha, mu kwerekana ingano idasanzwe y’umuvuduko wa 5G.
Abahanga bavuga ko 5G ishobora no kuzagera ku muvuduko uhanitse ukubye inshuro 100 uwa 4G. Ibi bisobanuye ko kumanura [download] filime y’amasaha abiri byatwara amasegonda 10 mu gihe kuri 4G bisaba iminota irindwi. Ntiwakwirengagiza ko umuvuduko wa internet ujyana n’aho iherereye n’umubare w’abari kuyikoresha.
Umuntu ushaka gukoresha internet ya 5G agomba kugira agakoresho gafite ubushobozi bumufasha kuyifashisha. Ibigo by’ikoranabuhanga nka Samsung, Motorola, Huawei, LG, OnePlus byashyize ku isoko telefoni zishobora gukoresha 5G. Sosiyete ya Apple nayo irateganya gushyira hanze iPhone ikoresha 5G bitarenze 2020.
Huawei yamuritse mudasobwa zirimo MateBook X Pro, MateBooks n’akuma kazatuma abantu babasha gukoresha internet ya 5G mu ngo zabo kitwa 5G CPE Pro. Inafite telefoni ya Mate X ikoresha 5G.
GSMA igaragaza ko mu 2025, nibura ½ cya telefoni zizaba zikoresha 5G, izisigaye zikoresha 4G na 3G. Internet ya 5G ishobora gutanga 20GB ku isegonda, yakwifashishwa mu buvuzi bw’iyakure, mu kugenzura ibikorwa wibereye ahandi n’ibindi.
Mu Rwanda ho hakoreshwa 4G yatangijwe mu 2014, ubu 95% by’igihugu bigerwaho n’umuyoboro wa murandasi yihuta mu gihe mu gihugu hose hagera 4G.
Biteganyijwe ko ikoranabuhanga rya internet yihuta ya 5G rizakurikirwa n’iya 6G bivugwa ko izatangira gukoreshwa mu 2030.

Title: Cogebanque yatanze telefone igihumbi muri gahunda ya Connect Rwanda
Body:
Banki y’Ubucuruzi ya Cogebanque yashyikirije MTN Rwanda telefone zigezweho 1000 zizahabwa Abanyarwanda batishoboye muri gahunda ya Connect Rwanda, igamije kugeza smartphones ku badafite ubushobozi bwo kuzigurira.
Banki y’Ubucuruzi ya Cogebanque yashyikirije MTN Rwanda telefone zigezweho 1000 zizahabwa Abanyarwanda batishoboye muri gahunda ya Connect Rwanda, igamije kugeza smartphones ku badafite ubushobozi bwo kuzigurira.
Ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa Kane tariki 12 Werurwe, nibwo abayobozi ba Cogebanque bashyikirije MTN Rwanda telefone 1000 mu rwego rwo gutanga umusanzu wayo mu kwihutisha ikoranabuhanga mu banyarwanda.
Ku wa 20 Ukuboza 2019 nibwo MTN Rwanda yatangije ubukangurambaga bwa Connect Rwanda, ibigo n’abantu ku giti cyabo batangira kwiyemeza umubare wa telefoni zigezweho bazatanga zigahabwa abaturage badafite ubushobozi bwo kuzigura mu turere dutandukanye, nibura imwe muri buri rugo.
Kuva icyo gihe ibigo bitandukanye n’abantu ku giti cyabo bahise batangira kwiyemeza izo bazatanga, abandi bakazitanga cyangwa bagatanga amafaranga yo kuzigura.
Uretse gushyigikira iyi gahunda ya Connect Rwanda, Cogebanque ikomeje gahunda zitadukanye zigamike guteza imbere ikoranabuhanga.
Yagabye amashami 28, ifite aba-agents barenga 600, ikaba ifite serivisi zitandukanye zitangwa hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga ririmo amakarita, internet banking ndetse na telefone (Mobile banking, Mobile App na push & pull).
Ni serivisi yifashishwa n’abakiliya b’iyi banki mu kuba babona uko konti zabo zihagaze mu gihe havuyeho amafaranga cyangwa yongewe kuri konti, ishobora kandi kwifashihwa mu kwishyura fagitire z’amazi n’umuriro ndetse uyikoresha ashobora no kwiyoherereza amafaranga yo guhamagaza kuri telefone.
Cogebanque itanga Serivisi Mpuzamahanga binyuze mu ikoranabuhanga mu korohereza abanyarwanda kwizigamira nkuko biri muri gahunda za leta.

Title: Kubona amashusho y’urukozasoni byoroshye, intandaro y’ubwiyongere bw’inda ziterwa abangavu ?
Body:
Uko imyaka ishira indi igataha niko raporo zisohoka zigaraga imibare iteye impungenge y’abangavu baterwa inda mu Rwanda, yiyongera ku gipimo cyo hejuru kandi bikabagiraho ingaruka zitandukanye zirimo imibereho mibi, kubicira ahazaza n’ibindi.
Uko imyaka ishira indi igataha niko raporo zisohoka zigaraga imibare iteye impungenge y’abangavu baterwa inda mu Rwanda, yiyongera ku gipimo cyo hejuru kandi bikabagiraho ingaruka zitandukanye zirimo imibereho mibi, kubicira ahazaza n’ibindi.
Minisiteri y’Uburinganire n’Iterambere ry’Umuryango iheruka gutangaza ko mu mwaka wa 2016, abangavu basambanyijwe bakabyarira kwa muganga bari 17 849, mu 2017 bari 17337, mu 2018 bagera kuri 19 832 mu gihe hagati ya Mutarama-Kanama 2019 bari 15 596. Bivuze ko bose hamwe ari 70 614 guhera mu 2016.
Zimwe mu mpamvu zikunze kuvugwa zitera abana b’abakobwa guterwa inda zirimo ubukene, kubura ubumenyi ku buzima bw’imyororokere, kudakurikiranirwa hafi n’ababyeyi cyangwa abarezi babo n’amakimbirane yo mu miryango.
Hari kandi n’abavuga ko abana bagira inyumvire yo gushaka inshuti bakundana bakiri mu bugimbi n’ubwangavu abandi bagakomoza ku bwigenge abana basigaye bahabwa, bibaganisha ku gashungo kabashora mu ngeso mbi z’imibonano mpuzabitsina idakingiye.
Kubona amashusho y’urukozasoni byoroshye
Uwavuga ko ikoranabuhanga riyoboye Isi muri iki gihe ntabwo yaba abeshye kuko mu buzima busanzwe, mu buvuzi, mu burezi, mu buhinzi n’ahandi ririfashishwa, mu byiciro byose by’abantu, yaba abana, urubyiruko n’abakuze.
Ni umuyoboro wifashishwa na buri wese ushaka kugera ku byiza ariko hari na benshi bawifashisha mu bishobora kubagiraho ingaruka ubwabo zidasize na bagenzi babo.
Ubushakashatsi bwakozwe n’ikigo cyo muri Afurika y’Epfo ku ngaruka z’ikoranabuhanga ku rubyiruko, bwerekanye ko kubona uburyo bwo gukoresha internet byoroshye bituma rubasha gusura imbuga zitandukanye zirimo n’izitangaza amashusho y’urukozasoni n’andi arutoza imico mibi mu buryo bworoshye.
Ababukoze basobanuye ko uretse kugera kuri ayo mashusho mu buryo bworoshye bifashishije nka Telefone, mudasobwa n’ibindi, binatuma urubyiruko rutangira kugerageza gushyira mu bikorwa ibyo rwabonyeho, byinshi bigenewe abakuze gusa.
Ubushakashatsi bwakozwe na Cladho na HAGURUKA bwerekanye ko kuba abana b’abakobwa bakora imibonano mpuzabitsina bataragira imyaka 18 bituma batwara inda ku kigero cya 87.7%.
Imibare iheruka IGIHE yabonye y’urubuga Pornhub rufite izindi zigera kuri 40 ziyishamikiyeho zerekana poronogarafi ku Isi yerekana ko u Rwanda ruza ku mwanya wa 29 muri Afurika mu kugira abantu benshi bareba film z’imibonano mpuzabitsina, aho bazireba cyane ku Cyumweru bakadohoka ku wa Gatanu.
Abagore bo mu Rwanda bihariye kureba izi film ku rugero rwa 27% mu gihe ubusanzwe ku Isi hose abagore imbere y’izi film bari ku kigero cya 24%. Igaragaza ko mu mbuga za internet 50 zisurwa cyane mu Rwanda, ebyiri muri zo ari iz’amashusho y’urukozasoni.
Nta gushidikanya ko benshi mu bazisura bari ahanini mu kigero kiri munsi y’imyaka 40, gusa igiteye inkeke ni uko n’urubyiruko ruri munsi y’imyaka 20, kuri bamwe kureba ayo mashusho bisa n’ibyinjiye mu buzima bwabo bwa buri munsi.
Umuhuzabikorwa w’imishinga y’impuzamiryango y’uburenganzira bwa muntu CLADHO, Murwanashyaka Evariste, yabwiye IGIHE kuba abana bagera ku mashusho y’urukozasoni byoroshye biri mu byongera inda zitateguwe mu bangavu.
Ati “Natwe turabyemera ko abana kubona uburyo bagera ku mashusho y’urukozasoni bituma bamenya imibonano mpuzabitsina icyo aricyo bakiri bato, kandi ugasanga barimo kureba bimwe kuko bigaragaza neza uko bikorwa, bibereka neza uko ikorwa nabo bakabikora bashobora kuba bari kwigana ibyo babonye.”
Murwanashyaka yasobanuye ko kubera agashungo, iyo umwe arebye ayo mashusho y’urukozasoni aboneraho kuyasangiza bagenzi be ku mbuga nkoranyambaga nka WhatsApp bigatuma n’umwana utari ufite gahunda bigatuma yishora mu mibonano mpuzabitsina akiri muto.
Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Impuzamiryango Pro-femme twese hamwe, Emma Marie Bugingo, yabwiye IGIHE ko ubusanzwe impamvu zitera ubwiyongere bw’inda ziterwa abangavu ari nyinshi zirimo no kuba urubyiruk0 rubona amashusho y’urukozasoni mu buryo bworoshye.
Ati “Nibyo, abantu bareba ayo mashusho y’urukozasoni nayo akurura abantu kugira imyitwarire mibi.”
Hakorwe iki ngo bikumirwe?
Umwaka ushize Guverinoma yashyizeho Politiki iteganya uburyo ibitangazwa kuri internet bikwiye kuba birinda abana kujya mu myitwarire mibi .
Murwanashyaka yavuze ko igikenewe ari ukwigisha iyi politiki abantu bose kandi hagakorwa ubugenzuzi ko byubahirizwa.
Ati “Igikenewe ni uko iyo Politiki yigishwa abana, ikigishwa abarezi, ababyeyi n’uburyo bwo kuyishyira mu bikorwa, ntibe iyo mu bitabo gusa, abantu bakayimenya na RURA ikagenzura uko abantu bakurikiza imbuga nkoranyambaga kugira ngo abantu birinde ibyo bintu byose.”
Si ibyo gusa kuko asanga n’abantu bakoresha inzu abantu bifashisha bashaka serivisi z’ikoranabuhanga bakwiye kwigisha iyi politiki bakanategekwa gushyiramo ibyapa bibuza abana kureba ayo mashusho, bakashyiramo uburyo bubuza abana gusura izo mbuga.
Ati “Ababyeyi bakwiye gutozwa uburyo bwo kugendana n’iterambere kuko niryo rituma umwana abasha kugera kuri ibyo bikoresho kandi ntitwarihagarika, ahubwo ni gute turimo gusobanurira abana uko bagendana naryo.”
Bugingo we yashimangiye ko ababyeyi n’abandi bafite mu nshingano urubyiruko bakwiye kongera uburyo bwo kwigisha urubyiruko uburyo rwitwara, bijyanye n’iterambere kuko utahagarika ikoranabuhanga.
Ati “Ntiwashyira umupolisi kuri buri muntu ukoresha telefone cyangwa ibindi byamufasha kureba ayo mashusho, njye mbona kimwe n’izindi mpamvu zitera ubwiyongere bw’inda ziterwa abangavu, hakwiye kuba ikintu cyo gukomeza kubaganiriza.”
Uyu muyobozi avuga ko igihugu gishoboye gukumira ko abana bareba ayo mashusho ‘Byaba ari akarusho ariko bigafatanywa no kwigisha abana uburyo bitwara’.
Ishami rya Loni ryita ku buzima(OMS) rigaragaza ko mu bihugu biri mu nzira y’amajyambere, abakobwa miliyoni 21 bari mu myaka 15-19 na miliyoni 2 bari munsi ya 16, baterwa inda buri mwaka.
Nyamara miliyoni 16 bari agatati y’imyaka 15-19 na miliyoni 2,3 bari munsi ya 16 nibo babyara izo nda baterwa.

Title: Ubushakashatsi bwerekanye ko Smartphones zishobora gutera uburwayi bw’umutwe
Body:
Niba utekereza ko igihe wakoresheje kuri telefone igezweho (smartphone) yawe gishobora kugira uruhare mu kurwara umutwe ku buryo buhoraho, ufite ukuri, kuko ibyo utekereza bihuye neza n’ibyagaragajwe n’ubushakashatsi bushya.
Niba utekereza ko igihe wakoresheje kuri telefone igezweho (smartphone) yawe gishobora kugira uruhare mu kurwara umutwe ku buryo buhoraho, ufite ukuri, kuko ibyo utekereza bihuye neza n’ibyagaragajwe n’ubushakashatsi bushya.
Mu gihugu cy’u Buhinde haherutse gukorerwa ubushakashatsi ku itsinda ry’abantu, bwari bugamije kumenya neza isano iri hagati yo gukoresha smartphone no kurwara umutwe cyane cyangwa kwiyongera k’ububabare bukabije.
Nubwo hari inkuru zitizewe zerekana isano iri hagati yo gukoresha ikoranabuhanga n’ububabare, raporo yavuye muri ubu bushakashatsi igaragaza ko hari ibimenyetso bike bigaragaza isano iri hagati ya smartphone n’ububabare bw’umubiri w’uyikoresha.
Abashakashatsi bakoreye ubushakashatsi bwabo ku bantu 400 bafite ikibazo cyo kurwara umutwe mu byiciro bitandukanye, birimo uburwayi buzwi nka ‘migraine’, kubabara umutwe w’imbere cyangwa inyuma bifatwa na bamwe nk’umutwe uterwa n’ibibazo ndetse n’ubundi bwoko butakomotse ku bundi burwayi.
Nyuma yo kubaza abakoreweho ubushakashatsi uburyo bakoresha telefone zabo, uburyo bakunze kurwara umutwe ndetse n’uburyo bakoresha imiti iyo barwaye umutwe; abashakashatsi basanze abakoresha smartphone bakunze gukoresha imiti igabanya ububabare inshuro nyinshi kandi bakoroherwa buhoro ugereranyije n’abatarakoresheje izo smartphone.
Dr. Deepti Vibha, umwe mu bakoze ubu bushakashatsi, akaba n’umwarimu wigisha ubuvuzi bw’indwara zo mu mutwe mu Ishuri Rikuru ry’Ubuvuzi mu Buhinde, yavuze ko ibyagaragajwe n’ubushakashatsi byerekana ko telefone zigezweho (Smartphones) zishobora kuba ari zo ntandaro yo kurwara umutwe cyane bikomeje kwiyongera.
Yavuze kandi ko hari ibyo ubushakashatsi bushobora kuba butaragaragaje bizerekanwa n’ubundi bushakashatsi buzakorwa mu gihe kizaza.
Ati “Ubushakashatsi bwatangajwe kuwa gatatu, ntibwemeza bidasubirwaho ko smartphones ari zo zitera umutwe, icyo bwakoze ni ukongera ubumenyi ku ngaruka za smartphones ku buzima bw’abantu uko turushaho kuzifashisha mu kuzuza inshingano zacu za buri munsi.”
Isano iri hagati ya Smartphones n’ububabare
Mu kigo cyita ku barwayi mu Buhinde, abakoreweho ubushakashatsi bagabanyijwe mu matsinda abiri: abatarakoresheje itelefone igezweho cyangwa abakoresheje ifite uburyo bwo guhamagara gusa ndetse n’abakoresheje smartphones.
Abakoreweho ubushakashatsi basubije ibibazo bijyanye n’uburyo bakoresha smartphones ndetse n’inshuro barwara umutwe n’ibimenyetso bibonaho.
Nyuma yo kugereranya ibisubizo byatanzwe, abashakashatsi basanze 96% by’abakoresha smartphones bakunze gufata imiti igabanya ububabare ugereranyije na 81% by’abadakoresha smartphones.
Abakoresha smartphones bagera kuri 84% bavuze ko batoroherwa neza iyo bamaze kunywa imiti igabanya ububabare mu gihe barwaye umutwe, mu gihe abatazikoresha bo boroherwa cyangwa bagakira neza bangana na 94%.
Abakoresha smartphones bavuze kandi ko babona ibimenyetso byinshi biranga abantu bagiye gufatwa n’uburwayi bw’igicuri cyangwa umutwe ufata uruhande rumwe, mu gihe abadakoresha smartphones bo bavuze ko badahura n’ibyo bimenyetso.
Gusa nta tandukaniro ryagaragajwe hagati y’aya matsinda yombi ku nshuro barwara umutwe, igihe bimara cyangwa uburemere bw’ububababre baba bafite.
Impamvu zikekwa
Abakoze ubu bushakashatsi bavuze ko zimwe mu mpamvu batekereza ko zishobora kuba zitera abakoresha smartphones kugorwa no gukira umutwe, zirimo ko umuntu ukoresha smartphones aba yubitse umutwe, bikaba byakwangiza imitsi y’igikanu.
Kugonda igikanu ngo basanze bigira ingaruka ku ruti rw’umugongo kuko ruba rumeze nk’urutsikamiwe, ku buryo rumera nk’urwikorejwe ibiro biri hagati y’icyenda na 13. Uku kumera nk’urutsikamiwe rero ngo ni byo bitera umutwe.
Kunanirwa kw’amaso, biterwa no gukomeza kureba muri telefone igihe kirekire mu buryo budakwiye no kwegereza amaso cyane telefone na byo ngo bishobora gutera umutwe nkuko byemejwe na American Migraine Foundation.
Dr. Heidi Moawad, inzobere mu byo kuvura imitsi, wigisha mu Ishuri ry’Ubuvuzi rya Case Western Reserve University na John Carroll University, yagize ati: "Intandaro y’iki kibazo ntikiramenyekana neza."
Yavuze ko bigoye kwemeza niba kurwara umutwe byasanishwa n’uburyo ijosi riba rimeze iyo umuntu ari gukoresha smartphones, niba biterwa n’urumiri rwa telefone, kubangamirwa kw’amaso, cyangwa niba biterwa n’umuhangayiko wo guhora abantu bari kuri Internet.
Ati “Ibisubizo bishobora kuzagaragara mu myaka iri imbere kandi amaherezo bizazana n’ingamba n’amabwiriza akwiye yo gukoresha smartphones.”
Uburyo bwo kugabanya ububabare
Umuyobozi w’Ishami ry’Ubuvuzi Rusange bw’Imitsi mu Ishuri rya Yale University, Dr. Christopher Gottschalk, yavuze ko mu gihe ubushakashatsi butagaragaza neza niba gukoresha smartphones ari impamvu itaziguye itera uburwayi bw’umutwe bukomeje kwiyongera, abantu bakoresha telefone za smartphones bagomba kwitonda bakagenzura niba umutwe wabo urushaho kubateza ikibazo mu gihe kirekire hanyuma bagasanga umuganga w’inzobere akabafasha.
Moawad asaba ko hashyirwaho ibikoresho by’ikoranabuhanga byafasha abakoresha smartphones kujya bakoresha amajwi gusa mu gihe bakeneye kuzikoresha kuko bizabafasha kujya bazikoresha bitabasabye kunaniza umutwe wabo.
Abashakashatsi bavuze ko hakenewe ubundi bushakashatsi kugira ngo abantu basobanukirwe neza ingaruka zo gukoresha smartphones ku mibereho yabo ya buri munsi.

Title: Ibikoresho by’ikoranabuhanga rya Android biri mu byago byo kwibasirwa n’aba-hackers
Body:
Telefoni n’ibindi bikoresho by’ikoranabuhanga bikoresha uburyo bwa Android birenga miliyari imwe, biri mu byago byinshi byo kuba byakwibasirwa n’abajura mu by’ikoranabuhanga (hackers), kuko bitagifite ubushobozi bwo gukoresha uburyo bujyanisha ubwirinzi n’igihe (Security updates).
Telefoni n’ibindi bikoresho by’ikoranabuhanga bikoresha uburyo bwa Android birenga miliyari imwe, biri mu byago byinshi byo kuba byakwibasirwa n’abajura mu by’ikoranabuhanga (hackers), kuko bitagifite ubushobozi bwo gukoresha uburyo bujyanisha ubwirinzi n’igihe (Security updates).
Ubushakashatsi bushya bwagaragaje ko ibi bishobora gusiga abafite izi telefoni ku Isi yose bari mu byago byo kwibwa amakuru no kugabwaho ibindi bitero by’ikoranabuhanga.
Bwagaragaje ko abagera kuri 40% bakoresha telefoni za Android, bafite izidashobora kwakira uburyo bushyira ku gihe (update) ubwirinzi butangwa na Google.
Buri wese ukoresha telefoni ya Android, yasohotse mu 2012 cyangwa hafi yaho, ni we urebwa by’umwihariko. Imibare ya 2019 ya Google yerekana ko hari abarenga miliyari 2.5 bakoresha Android.
Telefoni za kera zasuzumwe zirimo Motorola, Samsung, Sony na LG, byagaragaye ko zifite ibyago byinshi byo kwinjirirwa. By’umwihariko Samsung Galaxy S3 na Sony Xperia S zifite ibi byago mu buryo bwihariye.
Buri wese ukoresha Android yasohotse mbere ya 7.0 ni ukuvuga mbere ya 2016, arasabwa kugerageza kuyijyanisha n’igihe.
Niba igikoresho cyawe gifite Android kimaze imyaka irenze ibiri, genzura niba cyashyirwa ku rundi rwego (version) y’imikorere yacyo. Niba uri kuri version irenze 7.0, gerageza kuyijyanisha n’igihe unyuze kuri Settings> System>Advanced System update.
Niba bidakunda, ubwo telefoni yawe iri mu byago byo kwibasirwa n’abajura mu ikoranabuhanga by’umwihariko niba ukoresha Android ya 4 cyangwa munsi yayo.
Abahanga mu by’ikoranabuhanga batanze umuburo ku bafite ibyo bikoresho ko bakwiye kwitondera kumanura (download) application zitari muri Google Play Store no kugira amakenga ku butumwa bugufi (SMS) n’ubunyujijwe mu ikoranabuhanga (MMS) bakira.
