WhatsApp yari muri application zamanuwe (download) mu myaka 10 ishize, ku nshuro ya mbere yari yatanze umuburo ko izi mpinduka zizaba mu 2017.
Ni icyemezo Umuvugizi wa WhatsApp avuga ko kigoye ariko cyari gikwiye gufatwa mu gufasha abantu kuganira n’inshuti, imiryango mu buryo bwizewe.
Mu 2016 nibwo WhatsApp yaherukaga gukura application yayo muri telefoni zitandukanye n’iza Windows ku wa 31 Ukuboza 2019.

Title: Mu 2019 Isi yahombye miliyari 8 z’amadolari kubera gufungira abaturage internet
Body:
Mu mwaka wa 2019, ubukungu bw’Isi bwahombye miliyari 8 z’amadolari kubera gufunga internet bitewe n’ibikorwa bya za Guverinoma byo kubuza abaturage kwigaragambya.
Mu mwaka wa 2019, ubukungu bw’Isi bwahombye miliyari 8 z’amadolari kubera gufunga internet bitewe n’ibikorwa bya za Guverinoma byo kubuza abaturage kwigaragambya.
Nk’uko bigaragazwa VPN, rwifashishwa mu gufungura amakuru ari ku mbuga za Internet zafunzwe, igihombo ku bukungu bw’Isi kubera gufunga internet n’imbuga nkoranyambaga cyazamutse ku kigero cya 235% ugereranyije no mu mwaka wa 2015/2016 ubwo igihombo cyari milyari 2.4 z’amadorali.
Raporo ya VPN igaragaza ko ingaruka iki kibazo cyateje zikwiriye kurangirana n’uyu mwaka wa 2020, kubera ko umwaka wa 2019 wagaragayemo ibikorwa bigera kuri 122, byatumye hafungwa internet amasaha ibihumbi 18 ku Isi hose.
 Ku burenganzira bwa muntu, raporo igaragaza ko ifungwa rya internet ryagize ingaruka ku bwisanzure bw’abaturage no ku burenganzira bwo kubona amakuru, binateza imvururu.
Iki kibazo cyagaragaye cyane mu bihugu byo mu Burasirazuba bwo hagati no mu Majyaruguru ya Afurika, aho igihombo cyageze kuri miliyari 3.1 z’amadolari.
Mu bihugu biri munsi y’ubutayu bwa Sahara, igihombo cyageze kuri miliyari 2.1 z’amadolari, na ho muri Aziya kigera kuri miliari 1.6 z’amadolari.
Gufunga interineti byagaragaye cyane igihe Guverinoma zabaga zihangana n’abigaragambya cyane cyane mu gihe cy’amatora, mu rwego rwo kugira ngo bagenzure uburyo amakuru agenda no kubafasha kuguma ku butegetsi.
Guverinoma zibanze cyane mu gufunga imbuga nkoranyambaga nka WhatsApp, Facebook, Twitter na YouTube.
Gufunga internet ntibyateje igihombo ku bukungu rusange gusa, ahubwo mu bihugu bikiri mu nziza y’amajyambere byatumye iterambere ridindira n’abashoramari babitakariza icyizere.
Muri Sudani, Internet yafunzwe amasaha 864, imbuga nkoranyambaga zifungwa amasaha 696, ibi byateje igihombo cy’agera kuri miliyari 1.8 z’amadolari, ndetse habaye imyigaragambyo yatumye Perezida Omar-al-Bashir yegura, habaho n’imirwano hagati y’igisirikare n’abaturage.
Ibindi bihugu byagaragayemo iki kibazo ni Algeria, Tchad, Repubulika iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo, Ethiopia, Zimbabwe, Mauritanie, Misiri, Bénin, Gabon, Eritrea no muri Liberia.
Ku isi hose, Iraq ni yo yagize igihombo kinini kingana na miliyari 2.3 z’amadolari.

Title: Umuburo! Abantu 9,000 binjiriwe bagerageza gushaka indirimbo z’abahanzi bakomeye ku Isi
Body:
Abajura mu by’ikoranabuhanga bahanze software ibafasha gukoresha amazina y’abahanzi n’indirimbo zahataniye ibihembo bya Grammy Awards 2020 bakinjira mu mikorere ya mudasobwa z’abantu batandukanye.
Abajura mu by’ikoranabuhanga bahanze software ibafasha gukoresha amazina y’abahanzi n’indirimbo zahataniye ibihembo bya Grammy Awards 2020 bakinjira mu mikorere ya mudasobwa z’abantu batandukanye.
Software iri gukoreshwa ikoze mu buryo umuntu umanuye (download) indirimbo, mudasobwa ye cyangwa igikoresho yifashishije gifatwa na virusi ituma kibasha kwinjirirwa hanyuma nyiracyo akibwa amakuru y’ibanga akibitsemo.
Ikigo gitanga Ubwirinzi mu by’Ikoranabuhanga cya Kaspersky, cyatahuye ko ibitero by’abashaka kwinjirirwa byazamutseho 39% mu 2019 ugereranyije na 2018; ibyinshi bikoresha amazina n’amasura y’indirimbo n’ibikorwa by’abahanzi batandukanye bafite ibigwi mu muziki.
Abahanzi barimo Ariana Grande, Taylor Swift n’umuraperi Post Malone bari mu bifashishijwe cyane n’abo bajura mu by’ikoranabuhanga bituma abantu benshi binjirirwa mu 2019.
Umuziki benshi bawufata nk’umuti, utanga uburezi ndetse ukananyuzwamo ubutumwa butandukanye. Ibi bituma ubwinshi bw’abawushaka buhura n’abajura mu by’ikoranabuhanga bawunyuramo bifashishije abahanzi b’ibyamamare nyamara bagambiriye gusakaza virusi zabo zizabafasha kwinjira mu bubiko bw’abantu benshi.
Yifashishije ibihembo bikomeye bitangwa mu kugaragaza ubukana bw’ikibazo, abashakashatsi ba Kaspersky basesenguye amazina y’abahanzi n’ay’indirimbo z’abahatanye muri Grammy Awards 2020 nuko ashobora kuba yaribasiwe n’iyo virusi.
Kaspersky yasanze hari ububiko bwakozwe (fichier) 30,982 bufite virusi kandi bwifashishije amazina y’abahanzi cyangwa indirimbo zabo mu gusakaza iyo virusi, yahuye n’izigera ku 41,096 zikoresha Kaspersky.
 Ubusesenguzi bwakoze bwasanze Ariana Grande, Taylor Swift na Post Malone ari bo bahanzi bakoreshejwe cyane kuko files zirenga 55% zasanganywe iyo virusi zari mu mazina yabo.
Ibi kandi ni nako byagenze kuri Billie Eilish Pirate Baird O’Connell, umuhanzi uheruka kwegukana ibihembo bitanu bya Grammy Awards. We na Finneas bavukana unamutunganyiriza indirimbo nibo begukanye ibihembo byinshi kuko na we yatahanye bitanu.
Uyu Munyamerika w’imyaka 18 yamamaye mu 2019 ndetse umubare w’abashaka indirimbo zitiriwe izina rye ariko zifite virusi uriyongera cyane ugereranyije na 2018 kuko wavuye 254 ugera kuri 2171.
Mu gihe abantu binjiriwe na virusi yavuye mu ndirimbo zitiriwe Billie Eilish muri Nigeria bari 381 mu 2018 bageze kuri 9,722 mu 2019. Muri rusange, mu mwaka wa 2019 Nigeria yahuye n’ibitero 94,630.
Indirimbo abajura mu by’ikoranabuhanga bagize iturufu yo kwinjirira mu bubiko bw’abantu mu 2019 zirimo ‘Sunflower’ ya Post Malone ‘Talk’ ya Khalid na ‘Old Town Road’ ya Lil Nas X.
Abahanga mu by’ikoranabuhanga bagaragaza ko mu kwirinda ko wakwinjirirwa na virusi mu gihe cyo kumva umuziki cyangwa kumanura indirimbo ugomba gukoresha serivisi zizewe nka Apple Music, Spotify Premium na Amazon Music cyangwa ugakoresha urubuga ruzwi ruriho indirimbo z’ubuntu rukwemerera kuzibona byemewe.
Ni ngombwa kwirinda link zishidikanywaho, zizeza kubona umuziki wihariye. Ni byiza gukurikirana imbuga nkoranyambaga zizewe z’abahanzi kugira ngo umenye niba amakuru atangwa ari impamo.

Title: RICTA yashimiye Abafatanyabikorwa bitwaye neza mu 2019, inakomoza ku ngamba za 2020
Body:
Ikigo gihagarariye abakoresha internet no guteza imbere Indangarubuga y’u Rwanda [.RW], RICTA cyishimiye ibyo cyagezeho , gihemba abafatanyabikorwa bacyo bitwaye neza mu mwaka ushize wa 2019 ndetse kinabamurikira zimwe mu ngamba bafite mu mwaka wa 2020.
Ikigo gihagarariye abakoresha internet no guteza imbere Indangarubuga y’u Rwanda [.RW], RICTA cyishimiye ibyo cyagezeho , gihemba abafatanyabikorwa bacyo bitwaye neza mu mwaka ushize wa 2019 ndetse kinabamurikira zimwe mu ngamba bafite mu mwaka wa 2020.
Ibi byabereye mu nama ngarukamwaka ihuza ubuyobozi bw’iki kigo n’abafatanyabikorwa bacyo kugira ngo basuzume uko umwaka wagenze bafate n’ingamba z’umushya.
Muri uyu mwaka iyi nama yahuje ibigo bikora imbuga za interinet bikanacuruza indangarubuga y’u Rwanda bitadukanye.
Umuyobozi wa RICTA, Ingabire Grace yavuze ko umwaka wa 2020 utangiye bishimira ko hari abantu batangiye kumva ibyiza biri mu gukoresha indangarubuga y’u Rwanda.
Yagize ati “Kuva ubukangurambaga bwa Nahisemo .RW bwatangira, twabonye ko abantu babimenye, hari Abanyarwanda benshi batari bazi uko ikora, na benshi batekerezaga ko wenda itagera ku Isi hose nk’uko bamwe babitekereza, muri rusange twabonye amahirwe yo kuganiriza Abanyarwanda no kubamenyesha ko .RW ihari”.
Ikindi RICTA yishimira n’uko ubu abakenera kugura indangarubuga y’u Rwanda bashobora kuyigura bakoresheje telefone cyangwa mudasobwa banyuze ku mbuga z’abasanzwe bayigurisha bikabafata iminota itarenze itanu, mu gihe mbere byabasabaga kujya aho bakorera bakoresha inzira zigatinda.
Umukozi w’ikigo gikora imbuga za Interinet, Spiderbit, Rukundo Alexis yavuze ko n’ubwo abantu bagenda bitabira gukoresha indangarubuga y’u Rwanda, hakiri imbogamizi ku myumvire ndetse n’ibijyanye n’igiciro cyayo ugereranyije n’izindi.
Ati “Imbogamizi zikirimo ni iz’ibiciro, abakiliya cyane cyane baza bareba ibiciro, iby’ indangarubuga y’u Rwanda bisa nk’aho bikiri hejuru ho gato y’ibisanzwe ku zindi ndangarubuga, indi ni uko abakiliya batarizera ko iyo indangarubuga yabasha kuyigeraho aho yaba ari hose ku isi ariko uko ubukangurambaga bugenda bwiyongera abantu bagenda babyumva”.
Muri iyi nama yahuje RICTA n’abafatanyabikorwa bayo, bunguranye ibitekerezo by’uburyo bashobora gukusanyiriza hamwe serivisi batanga harimo indagarubuga ya .RW, urubuga rwa interneti n’ububiko rw’urubuga kugira ngo borohereze abakiliya babagana ku bijyanye n’ibiciro.
Kuva ibikorwa byo gukangurira abantu gukoresha indangarubuga y’u Rwanda byatangira, umubare w’imbuga ziherwa na .RW zarazamutse zigera ku 4419 zivuye ku 3488.
Muri iyi nama kandi hahembwemo ikigo kigurisha imbuga za internet mu Rwanda no ku Isi cyitwa ‘Afriregister’ nk’umufatanyabikorwa wa RICTA witwaye neza mu mwaka ushize, naho Megabit ihembwa nk’umufatanyabikorwa mushya witwaye neza.
Umuyobozi wa RICTA, Ingabire Grace yavuze ko muri uyu mwaka bateganya gukoramo ibikorwa bitandukanye ndetse bakazarushaho gukorana n’abafatanyabikorwa batandukanye mu kurushaho kumvisha abantu akamaro ko gukoresha indangarubuga y’u Rwanda.
Ati “Muri uyu mwaka turimo turateganya ukuntu twakagura indangarubuga y’u Rwanda dufatanyije n’abafatanyabikorwa bacu mu kureba ukuntu twayimenyekanisha, na wa mucuruzi uri hasi, ejo ashobore kubona urubuga aho ashobora gucuruza, ishuri rishobore kugira urubuga rwa internet, aho umubyeyi ashobora kuvugana n’ishuri cyangwa n’ibindi bigo bisanzwe bashobore kugera kuri Internet kuko niyo si tugezemo”.
Umwaka wa 2020, ni umwaka RICTA izakomeza gukora inama zitandukanye zo guhuza abantu bakoresha izindi ndangarubuga zirimo .com na .net kugira ngo barusheho kumva akamaro ko gutunga indangarubuga y’u Rwanda (.Rw).

Title: Alibaba yatangije ikoranabuhanga ryo kwisuzumisha indwara ku buntu
Body:
Alibaba imenyerewe mu bucuruzi bwo kuri internet, yatangije serivisi y’ikoranabuhanga yo gusuzuma uburwayi ku buntu, hagamijwe kugabanya igitutu ku bitaro kirimo guturuka ku ikwirakwira rya virusi ya Coronavirus.
Alibaba imenyerewe mu bucuruzi bwo kuri internet, yatangije serivisi y’ikoranabuhanga yo gusuzuma uburwayi ku buntu, hagamijwe kugabanya igitutu ku bitaro kirimo guturuka ku ikwirakwira rya virusi ya Coronavirus.
Abakoresha iyi serivisi bazajya babasha gusuzumwa banabone amakuru kuri iki cyorezo ku gihe, hirya no hino mu gihugu binyuze ku rubuga rwa Alibaba ruzwi nka Taobao cyangwa kuri application ya telefoni yo kwishyuriraho yitwa Alipay.
Amagana y’abaganga bo hirya no hino mu gihugu barimo gutanga serivisi zo gusuzuma binyuze kuri iyi application, aho muri bo abarenga 70%, ari inzobere mu bijyanye n’indwara z’ubuhumekero n’ubuvuzi rusange.
Kugera Saa Sita z’amanywa zo ku cyumweru, iyi serivisi yari imaze kwakira hafi abantu 400 000, nyuma y’amasaha 24 itangijwe. Abagera kuri 97% byabo ni abo mu ntara ya Hubei mu Bushinwa aho icyorezo cya Coronavirus, cyugarije cyane.
Abarenga 90% barabaza ku buryo bwo kwirinda no kwivuza icyorezo cya Coronavirus n’ibihaha.
Ikigo Alibaba cyashinzwe mu 1999 n’umuherwe w’Umushinwa, Jack Ma, ubu kikaba kibarirwa mu gaciro ka miliyari 460 z’amadolari.

Title: Umuburo ku bakoresha WhatsApp kubera abatekamutwe bakomeje kubibasira
Body:
Mu gihe WhatsApp imaze kuba uburyo bwifashishwa na miliyari z’abaturage mu itumanaho rya buri munsi, ni nako abatekamitwe bakamejeje mu kuyifashisha babambura kandi bakabikora mu izina ry’umuntu runaka, ukaba wamuha amafaranga nyamara ari abamwiyitiriye.
Mu gihe WhatsApp imaze kuba uburyo bwifashishwa na miliyari z’abaturage mu itumanaho rya buri munsi, ni nako abatekamitwe bakamejeje mu kuyifashisha babambura kandi bakabikora mu izina ry’umuntu runaka, ukaba wamuha amafaranga nyamara ari abamwiyitiriye.
N’iyo bitaba kukwambura amafaranga, ushobora kwibwa amakuru runaka cyangwa konti yawe ikaba yakoreshwa mu gukwirakwiza amakuru atariyo. Nta n’uwo bitabaho, kuko uheruka guhura n’iri sanganya ari Minisitiri w’Ubutabera akaba n’Intumwa Nkuru ya Leta, Johnston Busingye.
Birasanzwe ko iyo ugiye gukoresha WhatsApp bwa mbere muri telefoni, iyo umaze gushyiramo nomero ya telefoni hari imibare itandatu (verification code) wohererezwa kuri ya nimero uzajya ukoresha kuri WhatsApp.
Iyo nimero ushaka gukoresha ari yo iri muri iyo telefoni, uwo mubare uhita wiyuzuza ahabigenewe nta kindi bigusabye. Iyo iri mu yindi telefoni, wa mubare niho ujya bityo bikagusaba kuwurebamo, ukawuzuza ahagenwe.
Ni nako bigenda iyo umutekamutwe ashatse kwigarurira WhatsApp yawe, ashyira iyi porogaramu nko muri telefoni ye, akuzuzamo nimero yawe ya telefoni, ugahita wohererezwa ya code utabizi.
Akenshi hari ubwo abo bantu bazakubwira ko hari ubutumwa bugufi bwakuyobeyeho bakagusaba kububoherereza. Ucyoherereza wa muntu iyo mibare, WhatsApp yo muri telefoni ye itangira gukora, iyawe ikavaho maze akigarurira ubutumwa bwose, agatangira kuvugana n’abantu bawe ari naho ahera abasaba amafaranga mu izina ryawe, uwemeye kuyohereza akamusaba kuyanyuza ku yindi nimero amuha.
Mu butumwa Urwego rw’Ubugenzacyaha, RIB, rukomeje gutanga, rusaba abantu “kudaha agaciro abakoherereza ubutumwa bugufi biyitirira abantu musanzwe muziranye, bagusaba kubasubiza ubutumwa bavuga ko buyobeye kuri telefoni yawe.”
Harimo kandi kwirinda gutanga imibare y’ibanga (verification code) ya WhatsApp ku bakubwira ko yayobeye kuri telefoni yawe n’iyo mwaba muziranye no gushishoza neza mbere yo kohereza amafaranga ku bantu bakubwira ko bayakeneye cyane byihuse ariko bahuze, bari buyagusubize, n’iyo mwaba muziranye. Nibiba ngombwa ubanze umuhamagare.
RIB ikomeza iti “Mu gihe uhuye n’iki kibazo wakwihutira gutanga ikirego cyawe kuri Sitasiyo ya RIB ikwegereye cyangwa ugahamagara kuri nimero ya RIB itishyurwa 166. Ni ngombwa kubigeza kuri RIB bikiba kugira ngo usubizwe WhatsApp yawe kuko iyo bidakozwe vuba uwibye WhatsApp akomeza kuyikoresha yiba abandi.”
Ni ibintu byeze ku buryo hari ubwo iyi code izana n’ahantu ukanda (link), wabikora utaranamenya n’ibyo ari byo bikaba bisobanuye ko wa mubare ari wowe uwemeje, ukaba ushyize WhatsApp yawe mu maboko y’abagizi ba nabi.

Title: Ikoranabuhanga rishya rishobora gutuma tugera kuri Mars vuba
Body:
Abahanga mu ikoranababuhanga batangiye kwiga uburyo bushya bwakwifashishwa mu koroshya urugendo ruva ku Isi rugana kuri Mars.
Abahanga mu ikoranababuhanga batangiye kwiga uburyo bushya bwakwifashishwa mu koroshya urugendo ruva ku Isi rugana kuri Mars.
Impamvu y’ubu buvumbuzi bushya buri gukorwa irumvikana. Ni uko inzira ziganisha ku mpera y’Isi na Mars zose zisaba kuzenguruka ukwezi, harimo intera ndende iri hagati y’ibilometero miliyoni 54.6 na 401.
Ubutumwa bwo kujya kuri Mars bukorwa mu gihe iyi mibumbe yombi isa n’iyegeranye. Bifata amezi nibura icyenda kugira ngo umuntu agere kuri Mars hifashishijwe ‘rocket’ zigenda ziyongera umuvuduko uko zikora urugendo.
Icyo gihe bisaba ngo umuntu agere kuri Mars ni kirekire ku buryo bigoye ngo akimare ari mu rugendo. Abahanga barimo abo mu Kigo cya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika gikora Ubushakashatsi mu isanzure, Nasa, bari mu bushakashatsi kugira ngo bakore ikintu gishobora kwihuta mu kugera kuri Mars.
Mu ikoranabuhanga riri kwigwaho, harimo iryifashisha ingufu z’izuba.
Abahanga mu by’isanzure bari gukora ku mushinga wo gukora icyo umuntu yagereranya n’icyogajuru ariko cyifashisha ingufu z’izuba mu mushinga wiswe Solar Electric Propulsion, SEP.
Iri koranabuhanga ryitezweho ko rishobora kwifashishwa mu kohereza imizigo kuri Mars mbere y’uko habaho urugendo rw’umuntu. Ibyo byafasha ko abahanga mu bumenyi bw’ikirere bagerayo bagasanga hariyo ibikoresho byose bakeneye, gusa bo bagenda bakoresheje ‘rocket’ zisanzwe.
Uko uyu mushinga uteye ni uko icyo bazohereza kuri Mars kizaba gifite ubushobozi bwo gufata ingufu z’izuba kikazibyaza amashanyarazi asanzwe.
Ubusanzwe iyo icyogajuru cyoherejwe mu kirere kiba gikoresha ingufu zingana na kilowatt ziri hagati ya 10 na 15, ariko abahanga bari gushaka kuzongera nibura ku buryo zagera kuri Kw 50.
Ikibazo kiriho ubu ni ubushobozi bw’imizigo icyogajuru gikoresha imirasire y’izuba cyakoherezwa cyaba gifite kuko ubusanzwe ibintu bikoresha imirasi bikora neza iyo bitwaye ibintu bitaremereye cyane.
Ikindi gitekerezo ni ukwifashisha ibyogajuru bikoresha ingufu za nucléaire ku buryo bihaguruka ku Isi bigafungira amaferi kuri Mars.

Title: Toyota na Honda zakuye ku isoko imodoka zirenga miliyoni esheshatu kubera ibibazo bya tekiniki
Body:
Sosiyete ebyiri zikomeye ku Isi mu bijyanye no gukora imodoka, Toyota na Honda zombi zo mu Buyapani, zakuye ku isoko imodoka nyinshi kubera ibibazo bitandukanye zishobora guteza abazirimo.
Sosiyete ebyiri zikomeye ku Isi mu bijyanye no gukora imodoka, Toyota na Honda zombi zo mu Buyapani, zakuye ku isoko imodoka nyinshi kubera ibibazo bitandukanye zishobora guteza abazirimo.
Toyota yatangaje ko igiye gukura ku isoko imodoka miliyoni 3.4, muri zo miliyoni 2.9 ni imodoka ziri muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zifite ibibazo biterwa n’ibikoresho birinda abagenzi mu gihe cy’impanuka, Airbag.
Imodoka zifite ibibazo ni iziri muri Amerika ya Ruguru, iyo hagati n’Amajyepfo zirimo izo mu bwoko bwa Corolla, Corolla Matrix, Avalon, na Avalon HV zakozwe hagati y’umwaka wa 2010 na 2019.
Ku rundi ruhande, Honda nayo yatangaje ko igiye gukura ku isoko imodoka miliyoni 2.7 zirimo 2.4 ziri muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika n’izindi 300,000 ziri muri Canada.
Ubwoko bufite ikibazo ni izitwa Acuras zakozwe hagati y’umwaka wa 1996 na 2003 zifite ibibazo bya “airbag” zifite inenge mu buryo zakozwe.
Imodoka za Toyota ziri gukurwa ku isoko kuko zagakwiye kuba zikoranye ikoranabuhanga rigenzura rikamenyesha umuntu niba hari impanuka igiye kubaho ku buryo icyo gihe airbag ihita yifungura hanyuma n’imikandara y’intebe ikifunga ikikomeza ku buryo umuntu atagira imvune ikabije.
Toyota yatangaje ko ikoranabuhanga riri muri ziriya modoka rishobora kudakora neza mu gihe cy’impanuka bitewe na kirogoya zishobora kubaho ku buryo Airbag zitafunguka n’imikandara ntiyifunge cyane.
Honda yo yavuze ko imodoka yakuye ku isoko zifite ikibazo cya Airbag zakozwe n’uruganda rwa Takata zikoranye amakosa ku buryo aho kugira ngo zikize ubuzima bw’umuntu zishobora guturika.

Title: Instagram igiye kujya igenzura amafoto ayishyirwaho yanyujijwe muri Photoshop
Body:
Instagram ikomeje urugamba rwo kurwanya amakuru y’ibihuha akwirakwizwa ku mbuga nkoranyambaga, aho kuri ubu igiye kujya igenzura amafoto ayishyirwaho ashobora kuba atanga amakuru atari yo, cyane nk’aba yahinduwe hifashishijwe porogaramu itunganya amafoto ya Photoshop.
Instagram ikomeje urugamba rwo kurwanya amakuru y’ibihuha akwirakwizwa ku mbuga nkoranyambaga, aho kuri ubu igiye kujya igenzura amafoto ayishyirwaho ashobora kuba atanga amakuru atari yo, cyane nk’aba yahinduwe hifashishijwe porogaramu itunganya amafoto ya Photoshop.
Uru rubuga rugenzurwa na Facebook ruri gukora amavugurura atandukanye by’umwihariko agamije kurwanya amakuru y’ibihuha atambutswaho. Kuri ubu amavugururwa agiye gutangazwa mu minsi iri imbere azaba agenzura amafoto yakorewe muri Photoshop.
Hazajya hifashishwa uburyo bubiri. Ubwa mbere ni ubushingiye ku bitekerezo by’abantu, aho bazajya bavuga uko babona iyo foto, hanyuma ubundi bwo bushingiye ku igenzura rizajya rikorwa mu buryo bw’ikoranabuhanga.
Mu gihe ifoto bigaragaye ko iri gutanga amakuru atari yo kubera ko yahinduwe, izajya ibanza kugenzurwa mbere y’uko yongera kugaragara kandi ubutumwa buvuga ko iri gutanga amakuru atari yo buyigaragazweho.
Umuvugizi wa Facebook yatangaje ko amafoto atazajya ahishwa kuko yakorewe Photoshop, ahubwo ko azajya ashyirwaho ikirango mu gihe ari kugenzurwa.
Mu gihe iryo genzura rirangiye, kizajya gikurwaho mu gihe bigaragaye ko atari amafoto agamije gukwirakwiza amakuru y’ibihuha.

Title: Verizon yatangije ishakiro rya OneSearch riha umwihariko umutekano w’abakoresha internet
Body:
Ntabwo bitangaje kumva ko uko usura imbuga zitandukanye kuri internet, ayo makuru yose abikwa ndetse akagenzurwa, kimwe n’uburyo ushakisha ibintu kuri Google.
Ntabwo bitangaje kumva ko uko usura imbuga zitandukanye kuri internet, ayo makuru yose abikwa ndetse akagenzurwa, kimwe n’uburyo ushakisha ibintu kuri Google.
Niyo mpamvu uzabona hamwe unyura ushakisha niba ukoresha nka telefoni, iyo ugifungura urubuga rwa Google usanga imbuga wasuye kenshi ziyanditse hasi, ku buryo bitagusaba kongera kuzandikamo igihe wifuza kuzisura.
Hari uburyo bukoreshwa mu gushakisha ibintu runaka kuri internet, amayira wanyuze ntabikwe na porogaramu wakoresheje (browser). Uburyo bwari busanzwe ku isoko ni DuckDuckGo, ariko ku wa 14 Mutarama 2020 hari ubundi bwinjiye ku isoko. OneSearch.
Ni uburyo bwakozwe n’ikigo Verizon Media, bushobora kwifashishwa mu gushakisha ibintu binyuranye kuri internet, haba kuri telefoni cyangwa mudasobwa.
Itandukaniro ry’iri shakiro rishya (search engine) ugereranyije n’uburyo busanzwe, ni uko OneSearch ifata amakuru y’uyikoresha mu buryo bwihariye.
OneSearch yo ntabwo ikusanya amakuru y’umuntu unyuze muri iri shakiro ngo ibe yayagaragariza uwo ari we wese, cyangwa ngo igumane ibyo ukunda gushakisha, ku buryo ibigo bidashobora kwifashisha amakuru yawe ngo bikwamamazeho ibintu runaka bitewe n’ibyo babonye ukunda gushakisha.
Mu gushakisha ibyo umuntu akeneye, OneSearch ivuga ko izajya itanga “ibisubizo bidafite ikindi cyagize uruhare mu kubigena.”
Iki kigo kinavuga ko ibintu byose umuntu ashakisha bizajya birindwa, ku buryo niba ukoresha OneSearch umuntu adashobora kugukurikirana ngo amenye ngo ukunda kureba ibi cyangwa ukunda gusura imbuga runaka.
Iri shakiro rinatanga uburyo bwisumbuye bw’umutekano buzwi nka “Advanced Privacy Mode”, aho imbuga wasuye, nyuma y’isaha imwe zisiba mu ishakiro ryawe.
Nk’uko Verizon yabitangaje, ubu buryo buzafasha cyane mu kurinda amakuru y’umuntu wifashisha nka telefoni cyangwa mudasobwa agashakisha ikintu runaka kuri internet, nyuma undi muntu akaza kuyifashisha cyangwa icyo washakishaga ukagisangiza abandi.
Iri shakiro rya OneSearch naryo rizaba ryemera amatangazo yohererezwa abantu bari kuri internet, ariko azajya atangwa hashingiwe ku kintu runaka ushakishije, aho gushingira ku bintu ukunze gushakisha cyangwa imbuga ukunda gusura.
OneSearch ni kimwe mu bishya bihanzwe na Verizon Media, aho ije isanga ibindi bikorwa birimo ibinyamakuru HuffPost, TechCrunch na Yahoo. Ni imbuga Verison ivuga ko zisurwa n’abantu bagera kuri miliyoni 900 buri kwezi.
Umutekano w’abakoresha internet ni ikintu cyakunze gutindwaho cyane, bitewe ahanini n’uburyo ibigo bikomeye nka Facebook, Google na Amazon birimo gushinjwa gukoresha nabi amakuru y’ababikoresha.
Ni mu gihe ayo makuru usanga abyazwa umusaruro mu buryo bw’ubucuruzi, ibintu bikomeje gutuma nka Facebook ihora mu nkiko.

Title: Windows 7 mu marembera
Body:
Niba ugikoresha Windows 7 muri mudasobwa yawe, igihe kirageze ngo wimukire kuri Windows 10 igezweho.
Niba ugikoresha Windows 7 muri mudasobwa yawe, igihe kirageze ngo wimukire kuri Windows 10 igezweho.
Guhera kuri uyu wa 14 Mutarama 2020, uruganda rwa Microsoft rwahagaritse uburyo rwatangaga ubufasha mu kugeza ibintu bishya (updates) ku bakoresha Windows 7 cyangwa mu bijyanye n’umutekano.
Ku rubuga rwa Microsoft bagaragaza ko porogaramu ituma mudasobwa zikora (operating system) ya Window 10 Home igurwa $139, ariko ntibiraba ngombwa gutanga ayo mafaranga yose: Microsoft yatanze amahirwe yo kuyijyanisha n’igihe (upgrade) ku buntu bwagombaga kurangira mu 2016, ariko n’ubu biracyakora.
Mu mpinduka nshya ariko, Microsoft yatangaje ko izakomeza gufasha mu by’umutekano abantu bakoresha Windows 7 mu buryo bw’ubucuruzi ndetse banabyishyurira, bitandukanye no kuba byakorwaga ku bantu ku giti cyabo.
Windows 7 yagiye ku isoko mu 2009, ni imwe muri porogaramu zifashishwa cyane mu gukoresha za mudasobwa. Gusa mu mpera z’umwaka ushize Windows 10 yayiciyeho mu kuba ikoreshwa n’abantu benshi nk’uko ZDNet yabitangaje.
Igenzura ryakozwe na NetMarketShare mu Ukuboza 2018 ryerekanye ko mu mashini zarebweho, 39.2% zakoreshaga Windows 10 naho 36.9% zakoreshaga Windows 7.
Ubwo Windows 10 yasohokaga bwa mbere muri Nyakanga 2015, Microsoft yatanze amahirwe yo kuyisimbuza ku buntu ku bakoresha Windows 7, 8 na 8.1, kugeza muri Nyakanga 2016.
Gusa ubwo buryo bwakomeje gukora ku buntu, kuko ababigerageza bavuga ko bigikunda kugeza magingo aya.
Icyo ukwiye kuzirikana ni uko iyo Windows 7 uyisimbuje Windows 10 bihindura igenamikorere (settings) rya mudasobwa yawe, kimwe na zimwe muri porogaramu ufitemo zishobora guhinduka mu buryo zakoraga cyangwa zigasibama.
Hari uburyo bwo kugumana ibintu wabitse muri mudasobwa yawe ndetse n’amakuru yawe bwite, ariko bitewe n’itandukaniro riri hagati ya Windows 10 na Windows 7, ntabwo bikunda ko porogaramu zose wari ufite muri mudasobwa uzigumana uko zakabaye.
Windows 8.1 nayo ishobora kujyanishwa n’igihe igasimburwa na Windows 10, ariko yo ntabwo ari ngombwa ko isiba porogaramu wari ufite cyangwa ngo ihindure igenamikorere rya mudasobwa yawe.
Uko watangira gukoresha Windows 10 ku buntu
Niba ukoresha Windows 7, Windows 8 cyangwa Windows 8.1 Home cyangwa Pro:
1. Banza ubike mu buryo bwihariye (back up) inyandiko zawe, porogaramu cyangwa amakuru yawe bwite.
2. Jya aho ushobora kumanurira (download) Windows 10 ku rubuga rwa Microsoft.
2. Kanda ahanditse ‘Download’ ukurikizeho ahanditse ‘Run’.
3. Nimara gufunguka, hitamo ‘Upgrade this PC’ niba iyi Windows 10 ushaka kuyishyira muri mudasobwa urimo gukoresha, cyangwa ukande kuri ‘create installation media’, niba ushaka kuyibika nko kuri flash disc cyangwa ahandi, ngo uze kuyishyira mu yindi mudasobwa.
Ibyo nibiba birangiye, mudasobwa izakubaza niba ukeneye kugumana amadosiye yawe cyangwa niba ushaka gutangira bundi bushya.
Nuhitamo gutangira bundi bushya bizaba bivuze ko amadosiye yose wari ufite agiye gusibwa, ugatangira bundi bushya gushyiramo Windows 10.
Nimara kujyamo, uzahabwa uburyo bwo gutangiza Windows 10, aho ushobora kubona unyuze muri Settings > Update & Security > Activation.
Aha ariko niba usanzwe ukoresha Windows 7 cyangwa 8 Home, ushobora kujyanisha n’igihe Windows yawe igahinduka Windows 10 Home, mu gihe Windows 7 cyangwa 8 Pro ishobora kujyanishwa n’igihe ikaba Windows 10 Pro.

Title: Uko wagaruza telefoni yawe ya Android yibwe
Body:
Ushobora kuba waribwe telefoni yawe ikoresha uburyo bwa Android igahera burundu, cyangwa uzi mugenzi wawe byabayeho. Nugira amahirwe bazayigushikuza hafi aho hari abantu bagutabare igisambo gifatwe, ariko biranashoboka ko wakwicara ahantu ikava mu mufuka, wahava undi akayitwara ugakurayo amaso.
Ushobora kuba waribwe telefoni yawe ikoresha uburyo bwa Android igahera burundu, cyangwa uzi mugenzi wawe byabayeho. Nugira amahirwe bazayigushikuza hafi aho hari abantu bagutabare igisambo gifatwe, ariko biranashoboka ko wakwicara ahantu ikava mu mufuka, wahava undi akayitwara ugakurayo amaso.
Guta cyangwa kwibwa telefoni si ibintu buri wese ahita yakira bitwe n’uburyo tuzifashisha mu buzima bwa buri munsi, ariko hari n’uburyo wakomeza kuyikurikirana, ukamenya aho iherereye ikaba yagaruzwa!
Hari uburyo telefoni yawe ya Android yabuze ushobora kuyikurikirana, ukaba wayifunga uwayitwaye ntayikoreshe ndetse ugakurikirana aho iherereye mu buryo bworoshye. Hari intambwe z’ingenzi ugomba gutera igihe telefoni yawe ukiyifite mu maboko.
Yifunge mu buryo bwizewe
Ni ngombwa ko telefoni yawe uyifungisha uburyo bwizewe, butuma nta muntu wapfa kuyinjiramo. Ni ukuvuga gukoresha umubare w’ibanga kandi utapfa gufindurwa na buri wese nk’urimo imibare, ibimenyetso n’inyuguti nkuru, ugakoresha n’igikumwe kuri telefoni bishoboka.
Ikindi, ni byiza kwirinda gufunguza telefoni yawe isura kuri telefoni za Android, ibizwi nka Facial Recognition. Impamvu ni uko iyo isura y’umuntu ariyo ikoreshwa mu gufungura telefoni, iri koranabuhanga kuri telefoni zimwe rishobora kujijishwa n’umuntu uwo ari we wese, akoresheje nk’ifoto ya nyirayo.
Umwihariko uba kuri telefoni nshya za Google arizo Pixel 4 na Pixel 4 XL, kuko zo zikoresha ubuhanga bwihariye nk’ubwa Apple mu gukoresha isura y’umuntu, ku buryo bwakwizerwa kurusha izindi telefoni.
Uburyo bwa ‘Find My Device’ bwa Google
Iteka iyo winjiye muri telefoni yawe nshya ya Android, ugashyiramo konti ya Google (Gmail), uburyo bugufasha gutahura telefoni yawe bwa ‘Find My Device’ buhita bufunguka. Nibwo uzifashisha telefoni yawe yibwe cyangwa itakaye, ku buryo ushobora kuyifunga cyangwa ugasiba ibintu byose biyiriho kandi utayifite mu ntoki.
Ni ngombwa kwinjira muri telefoni yawe ukareba niba ‘Find My Device’ ifunguye, ukanyura mu igenamikorere rya telefoni (settings), ukajya mu bijyanye n’umutekano n’ibiranga ahantu (Security & Location), ukagera muri Find My Device. Ushobora no kunyura muri Google > Security > Find My Device.
Find My Device igomba kuba ifunguye, niba atari ko bimeze, yinjiremo maze urebe akarongo gatambitse kaguha icyerekezo kigana iburyo, ugakozeho urutoki ukajyane iburyo gaheze inguni, ku buryo hiyandikamoko “on” cyangwa kagahindura ibara.
Find My Mobile kuri Samsung
Niba utunze telefoni ya Samsung, uretse uburyo bwa ‘Find My Device’ butangwa na Google, uzabonamo ubundi bwihariye bwagenwe na Samsung, buzwi nka ‘Find My Mobile’. Ntabwo buguha amahirwe yo gukurikirana telefoni yawe yabuze gusa, bunaguha amahitamo yagutse kurusha uburyo bwa Google.
Muri iyo serivisi ya Samsung, wibereye aho uri ushobora gukurura ibintu biri muri telefoni wabuze (backup) cyangwa ukabona niba umuntu yavanyemo sim card yawe. Aho bigusaba kuba warafunguye konti ya Samsung kugira ngo ukoreshe ubwo buryo bwa ‘Find My Mobile.’
Kubwinjiramo uca muri ‘settings’ ukinjira muri Biometrics and security > Find My Mobile. Niba ugitangira kuyikoresha warahise ufungura konti ya Samsung muri ya masaha ya mbere, Find My Mobile iba irimo gukora. Niba atari ko byagenze, fata umwanya muto ufungure konti ya Samsung, ufungure na Find My Mobile.
Koresha Find My Device
Gukoresha ubu buryo bwa Google, bizagusaba gusura urubuga rumwe. Android.com/find. Ni rwo rubuga uzajyaho mu bihe nk’ibyo uzaba wabuzemo telefoni yawe. Ni ngombwa ko uzabanza kuzuzamo konti yawe ya Google ihura neza n’iri muri telefoni yawe ya Android.
Utari hafi ya mudasobwa, ushobora gukoresha indi telefoni ya Android, ugashyiramo application ya Find My Device uyikuye muri Play Store. Ukimara gushyira konti yawe muri urwo rubuga cyangwa iyo application, Google izahita itangira gushakira irengero rya telefoni yawe.
Ako kanya izahita ibwira umuntu uyifite ko nyirayo arimo kuyishakisha, ubundi ukoreshe amahitamo ari ku ruhande rw’ibumoso muri Find My Device kugira ngo utume itera hejuru, bityo niba iri hafi aho mu rugo ube wayibona, ubashe kuyifunga cyangwa usibe ibintu byose biriho niba yibwe.
Nuhitamo ahanditse ‘Secure Device”, uzaba uyifunze, kandi uzaba ushobora gukomeza kubona aho iherereye nubwo uzaba wayifunze. Niba ukoresha uburyo nka Google Pay mu kwishyurana kuri telefoni, kuyifunga bizatuma nta muntu ukoresha telefoni yawe ngo agire ikintu na kimwe agura.
Nuhitamo ahanditse ‘Erase Device’, ntabwo uzabasha kongera gukurikirana iyo telefoni kubera ko n’ibikuranga bizasibwa. Ubu ni uburyo bushobora gukoreshwa iyo ubundi bwose bwananiranye, ukavanamo ibyawe ubundi ukayiheba.
Igihe umujura yaba yazimije telefoni yawe, ntabwo wabasha kuyikurikirana kereka igihe yaba ayicanye kandi akaba arimo gukoresha internet. Google ihita ikoherereza email iyo ibone amerekezo ya telefoni yawe.
Iyo uyibonye, bigusaba kongera gushyiramo PIN cyangwa undi mubare w’ibanga kugira ngo ubashe kongera kuyikoresha, rimwe na rimwe bakanagusaba kongera gushyira umubare w’ibanga muri konti ya Google, kugira ngo bamenye neza ko ari nyir’ubwite urimo kuyikoresha.
Telefoni za Samsung
Nk’abakoresha Samsung Galaxy, bafite amahirwe yo gukoresha serivisi za Google cyangwa Samsung mu gushakisha telefoni yabuze. Ariko uburyo bwa Samsung hano nibwo bwizewe kurushaho kubera amahirwe y’inyongera butanga.
Ukeneye gukurikirana telefoni yibwe bimusaba gusura urubuga findmymobile.samsung.com. Aha ho nta application y’inyunganizi batanga nko kuri Google, ni ukuvuga ko ukoresha indi telefoni cyangwa mudasobwa, unyuze ahagenewe gusura imbuga zinyuranye.
Injiza konti yawe ya Samsung ahabigenewe, uhitemo telefoni yawe yatakaye ku ruhande rw’ibumoso. Ikarita igaragaza aho telefoni yawe iherereye izahita yigaragaza, unahabwe amahitamo anyuranye, ku ruhande rw’iburyo kuri telefoni yawe.
Hera ku gushyira imfunguzo muri telefoni yawe, ibintu bizahita buyoherezaho ubutumwa ushaka, bigahagarika amakariya yawe ya Samsung Pay ndetse uwayibye ntabashe kuba yayizimya.
Nyuma uhabwa amahirwe yo kurema ububiko bwihariye bw’ibintu biri muri telefoni yawe, ku buryo uramutse uyibuze burundu, uzaba ufite bwa bubiko bw’ibintu byose (backup). Niba telefoni igenda yimuka aho iri, unahitamo uburyo bukwereka izo nzira zose.
Ubwo buryo buzajya bukwereka aho telefoni yawe iri buri minota 15. Ushobora kandi kwemeza uburyo butuma umuriro umara igihe muri batiri ya telefoni yawe, ubwo buryo bukaba buhagarika ibintu byose, igasigarana gusa ubushobozi butuma ikugaragariza aho iri.
Kimwe na Find My Device yakozwe na Google, serivisi ya Samsung igusaba PIN yawe iyo umaze kubona telefoni yawe. Ntabwo igusaba gusubira kuri rwa rubuga waciyeho ngo uvanemo uburyo bwo gukomeza kuyikurikirana.
Ni ngombwa ko niba wibwe telefoni gutya, ukagira amahirwe ukamenya aho iherereye, utishora ubwawe ngo ujye kuyibohoza, cyane ko bishobora gutuma ugirirwa nabi n’umujura.
Ni ngombwa kwitabaza inzego zishinzwe umutekano zikabigufashamo, ukazishyikiriza ibipimo byose urimo kubona by’aho telefoni yawe iherereye.

Title: Umunyarwanda yavumbuye ikoranabuhanga rikoreshwa muri Gari ya moshi zo mu Bushinwa
Body:
Umunyarwanda wiga mu Bushinwa Katabarwa Gilbert yavumbuye ikoranabuhanga rya ‘Maglev Obsatcle detection’ rishobora kwerekana mbere inzitizi ziri mu nzira ya Gari ya Moshi zizwi nka ‘Maglev’ bityo rikayirinda gukora impanuka.
Umunyarwanda wiga mu Bushinwa Katabarwa Gilbert yavumbuye ikoranabuhanga rya ‘Maglev Obsatcle detection’ rishobora kwerekana mbere inzitizi ziri mu nzira ya Gari ya Moshi zizwi nka ‘Maglev’ bityo rikayirinda gukora impanuka.
Mu 2002 u Bushinwa bwatangiye gukoresha bwa mbere gari ya moshi izwi nka Maglev (magnetic levitation) zigira umuvuduko wa Kilometero 431 mu isaha ziri mu zihuta cyane ku Isi.
Ni gari ya moshi ikoresha ikoranabuhanga rya rukuruzi, aho igice cyayo gitwara abagenzi kigenda gikururuka ku nzira ikozwe muri rukuruzi, bikayiha imbaraga zidasanzwe zo kwihuta. Ni gari ya moshi idakoresha amashanyarazi cyangwa ibikomoka kuri peteroli, nta moteri igira muri make.
Guhera iki gihe ibindi bihugu bike nk’u Buyapani na Koreya y’Epfo n’ibyo byabashije gukoresha ubu bwoko bwa Gari ya Moshi nshya zihuta cyane.
Gusa n’ubwo izi Gari ya Moshi zagendaga zikundwa n’abatari bake kubera umuvuduko wazo wihutishaga urugendo, hari hakiri ikibazo cy’uko nta koranabuhanga rihari rishobora kuburira abazitwara n’abazigenzura igihe mu nzira yazo harimo imbogamizi ishobora kuziteza impanuka.
Aha niho Umunyarwanda witwa Katabarwa Gilbert Murenzi wari waragiye mu Bushinwa mu 2015 gukomeza amashuri y’icyiciro cya gatatu cya kaminuza muri Kaminuza ya Tongji iri mu Mujyi wa Shanghai, yahereye akora ubushakashatsi avumbura uburyo bushobora kwerekana ko hari imbogamizi iri mu nzira y’iyi Gari ya Moshi ya Maglev.
Mu 2016 nibwo Katabarwa wigaga amasomo y’ubugenzuzi (Surveying and geometrics) yahawe gukora ubushakashatsi ku cyuma gishobora kuvumbura inzitizi ziri mu nzira ya Maglev
Katabarwa avuga ko mu ntangiriro we na mwarimu we batumvaga neza uburyo ibi bizakorwa.
 Ati “Sinari nzi icyo Maglev ari cyo, ndetse na mwarimu wanjye yagaragaraga nk’utumva ibizava mu bushakashatsi."
Katabarwa yahisemo gukora ubushakashatsi kuko yumvaga ntawe uzamushyiraho igitutu cyo kuburangiza vuba, bityo akabubonamo amahirwe y’uko buzamuha umwanya wo kwikorera indi mirimo yafatanyaga no kwiga.
Yagize ati “Imyumvire yanjye yari uko niba mwarimu adafite ubumenyi buhagije kuri ubu bushakashatsi, bizampa umwanya uhagije wo kwita ku biraka byanjye byo hanze ndetse mu gihe nabaga mbajijwe aho bugeze nababwiraga ko nkiri kubukoraho”
Ibi si ko byagenze kuko mu 2018 Katabarwa yaje guhabwa iminsi 15 ngo yerekane aho ubushakashatsi yari amazemo imyaka ibiri bugeze, bitagenda gutyo akabura amahirwe yo kwishyurirwa ishuri yari yarabonye agasubira mu Rwanda.
Yagize ati “Naravuze nti nta buryo nasubira mu rugo. Nari narakoze uburyo busobanura iryo koranabuhanga nari ndimo nkoraho ubushakashatsi. Mu gihe nari ndimo mbubamurikira bashimishijwe cyane n’ibimaze gukorwa ndetse bansaba ko nakwitegura kubishyira mu bikorwa”
Katabarwa avuga ko mu gihe yakoraga ubu bushakashatsi yagowe cyane no kugira ubundi yareberaho kuko nta bandi benshi bari barabikozeho ndetse ko na bake babigerageje bitagenze neza.
Mu 2018 mu Ukuboza nibwo ku nkunga ya miliyoni 1 y’amadorali ya Leta y’u Bushinwa, Katabarwa Gilbert yatangiye gushyira mu bikorwa ibyo yari yarakuye mu bushakashatsi.
Iri koranabuhanga ryavumbuwe na Katabarwa rishobora kwerekana ibiti, abantu ndetse n’ibindi bintu bishobora kujya mu nzira ya Gari ya Moshi bigateza impanuka. Gari ya Moshi imenya ko hari ikiri mu nzira yayo itarakigeraho.
Katabarwa aganira na The New Times yavuze ko inzozi afite ari ukugaruka mu Rwanda agafasha mu mishinga iteza imbere imijyi igezweho n’uburyo bwo gutwara abantu n’ibintu.
 Ati “ Hamwe no kwiyongera kw’abaturage no kwaguka kw’imijyi, ikoranabuhanga rigezweho rirakenewe mu kugenzura imijyi. Ndashaka kugaruka mu rugo ngo ngire uruhare ku iterambere ry’imijyi yacu muri Afurika”.
Hagendewe kuri iri Koranabuhanga rya Katabarwa, umwaka ushize muri Gicurasi u Bushinwa bwatangiye igerageza ry’indi gari ya Moshi ishobora kugenda kilometero 600 mu isaha, ikazaba ifite ubushobozi bwo gukoresha amasaha atatu n’iminota 50, ahantu indege yakoresha amasaha 5 n’iminota 50.

Title: Ikoreshwa rya ‘smartphones’ zirimo gutangwa muri Connect Rwanda rizakurikiranwa rite?
Body:
Ku wa 20 Ukuboza 2019 nibwo MTN Rwanda yatangije ubukangurambaga bwiswe Connect Rwanda Challenge, aho ibigo n’abantu ku giti cyabo bakomeje kwiyemeza umubare runaka wa telefoni zigezweho bazatanga zigahabwa abadafite ubushobozi bwo kuzigurira hirya no hino mu gihugu.
Ku wa 20 Ukuboza 2019 nibwo MTN Rwanda yatangije ubukangurambaga bwiswe Connect Rwanda Challenge, aho ibigo n’abantu ku giti cyabo bakomeje kwiyemeza umubare runaka wa telefoni zigezweho bazatanga zigahabwa abadafite ubushobozi bwo kuzigurira hirya no hino mu gihugu.
Muri iyi gahunda igamije kuzamura no kwihutisha ikoreshwa ry’ikoranabuhanga mu Rwanda, abantu batangiye gutanga izi telefoni ndetse umuntu agasaba undi ahisemo kugira icyo yiyemeza, bigakorerwa kuri internet cyane cyane ku mbuga nkoranyambaga.
Icyiciro cya mbere cy’ubu bukangurambaga ni ukwiyemeza gutanga telefone zigezweho, aho intego yacyo ari ukugira ngo uruhare rwa buri muntu rugaragare mu kugeza ikoranabuhanga ku batarifite hatangwa smartphones.
MTN Rwanda igaragaza ko by’umwihariko hagati ya Werurwe na Ukuboza 2019 yari imaze gucuruza Smartphone zizwi nk’Ikosora zirenga ibihumbi 50 ariko hakigaragara icyuho mu gufasha Abanyarwanda gutunga telefone zigezweho, aho bakiri munsi ya 20% kuko mu baturage basaga miliyoni 12, abafite smartphone basaga miliyoni 1.7.
Umuyobozi wa MTN Rwanda, Mitwa Kaemba Ng’ambi, yabwiye CNBC Africa ko ubukangurambaga bwa Connect Rwanda ari igitekerezo cyaje mu kureba uburyo inzego zitandukanye zagira uruhare mu kongera umubare w’abafite telefone zigezweho, kugira ngo boroherwe no kuzifashisha muri gahunda z’ishoramari.
Kuva ubu bukangurambaga butangijwe, abantu n’ibigo bitandukanye bamaze kwiyemeza gutanga Smartphones zisaga ibihumbi 50.
Ng’ambi yavuze ko MTN Rwanda yahisemo gufatanya na Minisiteri y’ikoranabuhanga na Inovasiyo muri ubu bukangurambaga kugira ngo zizagezwe ku bo zigenewe kandi babikwiriye.
Ati “Ku bufatanye na Minisiteri y’ikoranabuhanga na Inovasiyo hashyizeho uburyo bugaragaza neza uburyo bizakorwa, abantu bose badafite smartphones, bazi neza abafite n’abadafite smartphones.”
Yasobanuye ko na Minisiteri y’Ubutegetsi bw’igihugu isanzwe ifite imibare y’ingo zifite n’izitafite telefone zigezweho, ikazaba ariyo igenderwaho hatoranywa abazahabwa izigera ku bihumbi 50 zamaze kwiyemezwa n’abantu n’ibigo bitandukanye.
Ati “Impamvu turimo gukora ibyo ni ukugira ngo twizere ko smartphones izahabwa umuntu koko utayitunze uyu munsi kugira ngo twizere ko bijyanye n’intego muri rusange ariko nanone no kureba abantu batabasha kubona serivisi z’ikoranabuhanga.”
Icyiciro cya mbere cy’ubu bukangurambaga cyatangiye mu Ukuboza 2019 hagati biteganyijwe ko kizashyirwaho akadomo mu byumweru bitatu bya mbere bya Werurwe 2020.
Uretse gukusanya smartphones zizatangwa muri iyo gahunda no kuzishyikiriza abagenerwabikorwa, MTN Rwanda izanafatanya na Minisiteri y’Ikoranabuhanga na Innovasiyo mu gushyiraho integanyanyigisho y’uburyo abaturage bazajya bakoresha porogaramu zizashyirwamo no kubakangurira kuri serivisi zitandukanye z’ikoranabuhanga zakwifashishwamo.
Ng’ambi yakomeje ati “Tuzakomeza no gukurikirana kugira ngo twizere ko umuntu wayikoresheje ejo hashize azanayikoresha ejo hazaza, tunarebe niba hari icyuho mu kuzikoresha, tubabaze niba bibanogeye cyangwa niba hari ubundi bufasha twabaha.”
Yavuze ko inyigo zitandukanye zagaragaje ko mu gihe umubare w’abakoresha telefone wiyongereye, bigira uruhare mu kongera umubare w’abakoresha ikoranabuhanga ndetse n’umusaruro mbumbe w’igihugu ukiyongera.
Ati “Ku ruhande rwanjye icyo niteze ni uko bazakomeza kuzikoresha bagakomeza kugerwaho na serivisi zitandukanye batabonaga mbere. Nk’uko nabivuze, serivisi nyinshi za Guverinoma zirimo gutangwa hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga ariko abantu bazibona baracyari bacye kubera ko badakoresha ibikoresho bizitangirwaho.”
“Ikindi mbona nk’amahirwe ni ubucuruzi buciriritse kuko mbere yo gutangiza ubu bukangurambaga, twaganiriye n’abantu benshi mu byaro tubabaza ‘Ese uwaguha smartphone ni iki wayikoresha?’ nk’abahinzi batubwiye ko hari amasoko ya kure y’aho batuye batabasha gucuruzamo ariko ko ‘bafite smartphone bashobora gufotora ibicuruzwa bakabishyira kuri internet bakaba babigura, bakabishyura nko kuri MTN Mobile Money n’ibindi.”
Yavuze ko hari n’abantu bakora n’abacuruza porogaramu za telefone batandukanye usanga batabasha kubona isoko ryazo rihagije kubera umubare muto w’abakoresha smartphone bazikenera, bityo uko bazagenda biyongera ari nako isoko rizaguka.
MTN Rwanda iteganya ko abantu bose bazahabwa izi telefone muri ubu bukangurambaga bazahabwa na Sim Card iriho na 1GB ya Internet mu gihe cy’amezi atatu ya mbere, mu rwego rwo kugabanya imbogamizi ku bantu bazitirwa no kubura internet.
Si ibyo gusa kuko inateganya uburyo na nyuma yazabagabanyiriza igiciro cya internet ku buryo batazajya bagorwa no kubona serivisi z’ikoranabuhanga no gukomeza gushaka smartphone zidahenze, ku buryo abantu bashobora no kuzigurira.
Biteganyijwe ko porogaramu 12 zizabanza gushyirwa muri izi telefoni zizatangwa muri #ConnectChallenge, zizaba ziri mu ndimi eshatu ari zo Ikinyarwanda, Icyongereza n’Igifaransa, bisobanuye ko abaturage bazihitiramo ururimi bakoresha.
Izo porogaramu zirimo Irembo, Serivisi za banki, iz’ubuzima, uburezi, kwishyura ifumbire bakoresheje Smart Nkunganire, amakuru ajyanye n’iteganyagihe n’ibindi.

Title: Hagiye gukorwa impinduka mu mikorere ya Bluetooth bwa mbere mu myaka 20
Body:
Bluetooth igiye gukora impinduka mu mikorere yayo ku nshuro ya mbere mu myaka 20, zizatuma uburyo amajwi yayo yumvikana buba bwiza kurushaho.
Bluetooth igiye gukora impinduka mu mikorere yayo ku nshuro ya mbere mu myaka 20, zizatuma uburyo amajwi yayo yumvikana buba bwiza kurushaho.
Impinduka za mbere zizagaragazwa n’uburyo amajwi asohorwa n’ibikoresho byifashisha Bluetooth [écouteur] azajya aba ayunguruye kurusha mbere, bikajyana n’ikoranabuhanga rishya mu twumvisho [écouteur] dukoresha ubu buryo. Bizanajyana n’uburryo umuriro uzajya ugenda ari muke ugereranyije n’ibisanzwe.
Iri koranabuhanga ryiswe Bluetooth LE (LE isobanura Low Energy ni ukuvuga Bluetooth idatwara umuriro mwinshi) rizatuma abantu bashobora no gusangizanya ibyo bari kumva bakoresheje igikoresho kimwe.
Ni ukuvuga ngo niba uri kumva umuziki kuri écouteur zawe, ukaba ushobora gusangiza undi muntu nawe agafatira ku yawe akumva.
Ibyo bizafasha abantu benshi kumva nk’indirimbo imwe cyangwa ikindi kintu kimwe. Nko mu gitaramo cyangwa ahandi hateraniye abantu benshi, ubu buryo buzafasha ko abantu benshi bumva ibintu bimwe buri muntu ari ukwe, ariko aho amajwi ari kuva ari ku gikoresho kimwe bafatiyeho.
Abantu bafite ubumuga bwo kutumva nabo iri koranabuhanga rishya rya Bluetooth mu gihe gito rizashyirwa mu twumvisho tubafasha kumva.
LE Audio ikora kuri écouteur zikoresha Bluetooth kandi ku muntu wari uzisanganywe ntabwo ashobora kurishyiramo, ahubwo bimusaba kugura inshya zizashyirwa mu isoko mu minsi mike.

Title: Havumbuwe ikoranabuhanga ririnda uburyo bwo guhumeka kw’abana bavutse batagejeje igihe
Body:
Abashakashatsi b’abanya-Israel, bakoze ikoranabuhanga ryo kurinda urwungano rw’ubuhumekero bw’abana bavutse batagejeje igihe.
Abashakashatsi b’abanya-Israel, bakoze ikoranabuhanga ryo kurinda urwungano rw’ubuhumekero bw’abana bavutse batagejeje igihe.
Ikigo cy’ikoranabuhanga cyo muri Israel (Technion), kuri uyu wa Kane cyatangaje ko iri koranabuhanga rigamije gukemura ikibazo cy’ubuhumekero bw’abana bavutse igihe kitaragera kuko usanga ibice bitandukanye by’umubiri wabo biba bitarakura neza.
Abana bavutse igihe kitaragera, usanga barangwa no kuba bafite ibibazo by’ubuhumekero bikaba ngombwa ko bahabwa ubufasha mu guhumeka hakoreshejwe icyuma gikoreshwa mu buvuzi mu gutanga umwuka.
Gusa ubu buryo bugira ingaruka zirimo kwangirika kw’ibihaha. Muri ubu buryo kandi buri mwana akenera gupimirwa impuzandengo y’ingano y’umwuka, uburemere bwawo, umuvuduko n’ibindi.
Abashakashatsi ba Technion, bakoze uburyo bwongera gutanga umwuka bigendanye n’ikigero cy’uko umwana ahumeka. Ubu buryo bushobora kurinda iyangirika ry’urwungano rw’ubuhumekero bw’abana kandi bukamufasha guhumeka neza.
Abashakashatsi kandi banavumbuye ikindi kintu gishobora kuba ku mwana kitari kizwi, aho umwuka usohokera mu gakoresho kaba kashyizwe mu munwa w’umwana (tube) ushobora kugira ingaruka ku mwana.

Title: Twitter igiye gushyiraho uburyo bwo guhitamo abemerewe kuvuga ku byo umuntu yanditse
Body:
Urubuga rwa Twitter rwatangaje ko rurimo kuvugurura imiterere yarwo ku buryo abarukoresha bazashyirirwaho uburyo bwo guhitamo abantu bemerewe gusubiza cyangwa kugira ibyo bavuga ku bintu barutangajeho, abo badashaka bakabisoma gusa ariko ntibabe bashobora kubisubiza.
Urubuga rwa Twitter rwatangaje ko rurimo kuvugurura imiterere yarwo ku buryo abarukoresha bazashyirirwaho uburyo bwo guhitamo abantu bemerewe gusubiza cyangwa kugira ibyo bavuga ku bintu barutangajeho, abo badashaka bakabisoma gusa ariko ntibabe bashobora kubisubiza.
Ubusanzwe ibyo umuntu yanditse kuri uru rubuga biba bishobora kuvugwaho cyangwa gusubizwa ‘Reply’ n’umuntu wese ubisomye, yaba asanzwe amukurikira cyangwa atamukurikira ‘Following’.
Umuyobozi ushinzwe kugenzura ibinyuzwa kuri Twitter, Suzanne Xie, yatangaje kuri uyu wa gatatu ko harimo kuvugururwa imiterere yayo ku buryo abayikoresha bazajya bahitamo uwemerewe kugira uruhare mu kiganiro cyangwa igitekerezo batanzeho.
Iyo miterere mishya izaba igenera umuntu wandika ikintu kuri twitter amahitamo ane arimo kureka buri wese akakivugaho, guhitamo abasanzwe bamukurikira gusa kandi yahisemo gusangiza icyo yanditse, guhitamo abo yifuza kugisangiza gusa cyangwa guhitamo ko ntawemerewe kukivugaho.
Uru rubuga rwaherukaga gushyiraho uburyo bwemerera abarukoresha guhisha bimwe mu bitekerezo byatanzwe ku nyandiko barushyizeho ruvuga ko ari mu rwego rwo guhindura uburyo imikorere y’ibiganiro birutangwaho no guha amahirwe abarukoresha amahirwe yo kugenzura ibitekerezo bitangwa ku nyandiko banyuzaho.
Bamwe mu basanzwe bakoresha uru rubuga bagargaje ko iyi miterere mishya izaba ari igisubizo ku bantu bibasiraga abandi ku nyandiko babaga barunyujijeho, rimwe na rimwe batari mu bo bifuzaga kuzandikira.
Iyi miterere Twitter irimo ishaka kuzana biteganyijwe ko izatangira gukoreshwa mu gihe cya vuba muri uyu mwaka nubwo itavuze neza ukwezi.
